loans.name: Duterimbere I Group

texts.fr:
Françoise est une commerçante âgée de 39ans qui habite  au centre ville de Gitega au centre du pays. Elle vend de la farine de manioc et du maïs depuis 20 ans. Elle vendait de la bière avant de commencer cette activité. Elle a fait ses études jusqu’en 6e année primaire. Elle est mariée a Jean et ont ensemble 7 enfants dont 6 étudient.
 Le crédit Kiva  de 250,000 francs burundais qu’elle obtient lui permet d’augmenter son capital pour acheter de grandes quantités de farine de manioc et de maïs à revendre afin de réaliser de grands bénéfices. 

Elle est membre  du groupe  communautaire« DUTERIMBERE I»
texts.en:
Françoise is a 39-year-old shopkeeper who lives in Gitega's city centre in the middle of the country. She has been selling manioc and corn flour for 20 years. Before beginning this business, she sold beer. She attended primary school up until the sixth year. She is married to Jean and they have 7 children together, 6 of whom are in school.

The Kiva loan of 250,000 Burundi francs that she is seeking will allow Françoise to increase her capital in order to purchase large quantities of manioc and corn flour to resell in order to make a large profit.

Françoise is a member of the DUTERIMBERE I community group.

loans.use: to increase her capital in order to purchase large quantities of manioc and corn flour to resell in order to make a large profit.

loans.name: Ramiro

texts.es:
Ramiro, ha decidido continuar fortaleciendo el negocio, comprara a través de este préstamo ropa para aumentar el negocio, la inversión será en blusas, faldas, ropa interior y pantalones, a través del préstamo espera continuar mejorando, ya que el anterior también le permitió realizar una buena inversión al negocio.
Su grupo  familiar se mantiene, sin mayores problemas, y su vida personal está bien con deseos de seguir creciendo como comerciante.
texts.en:
Ramiro has decided to continue strengthening his business.  With this loan, he will buy clothes to increase his business.  He will invest in buying blouses, skirts, underwear and pants.  Through his loan, he hopes to continue improving as his previous loan also enabled him to make a good investment in his business.

Ramiro's family are getting by without any major problems and Ramiro's personal life is good.  He is keen to continue working as a salesman.

loans.use: to buy blouses, skirts, underwear and pants

loans.name: Mchekwisha

texts.en:
Mchekwisha is a single woman and has one adult child. She operates a water kiosk and retail business. She's worked in this business for two years and her primary customers are neighbors and townspeople. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Mchekwisha's other sources of income include a pension and income from her child. She describes her greatest business challenge to be fluctuating supply prices and her largest monthly expense is food for her family.

Mchekwisha will use this 80,000 Kenya shilling (KES) loan to purchase inventory and other business supplies. Mchekwisha aspires to expand her business and purchase another water tank in the future. She joined Yehu because of their openness and loan processing times.

loans.use: To purchase inventory and other business supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase more cosmetics and to restock her grocery store.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”LAS EMPRENDEDORAS DE ANDAHUAYLILLAS”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Andahuaylillas en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Juana; La socia tiene 25 años de edad, la socia es conviviente, la socia tiene 1 hijo de 3 años de edad, la socia trabaja vendiendo abarrotes en la esquina de sus casa en el paradero principal de autos que tiene la ruta a Cusco, la socia vende detergentes, champoo, panes, jugos, gaseosas, galletas, atunes, aguas minerales entre otros productos que salen todos los días, la socia desea invertir el crédito en la compra de productos para la implementación de sus tienda de abarrotes en la carretera. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de productos de primera necesidad.
 La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank "Las Emprendedoras de Andahuaylillas". The communal bank is located in the district of Andahuaylillas, in the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

Her name is Juana. She is 25 years old and she is married common-law. She has a 3-year old son. She sells groceries from the corner of the block where her house is located, at the main car stop on the way to Cusco. She sells detergents, shampoo, bread, juices, soft drinks, cookies, tuna, mineral water, and other products that are sold on a daily basis. She wishes to invest her loan in the purchase of products to supply her street-side store. She requests a loan to purchase basic consumer goods.

She is thankful for the loan and she is committed to make the loan payments according to the agreed time table.

loans.use: to purchase basic consumer goods.

loans.name: Odette

texts.fr:
Odette est une femme âgée de 31 ans. Elle est célibataire.  
Odette travaille comme revendeuse depuis 2005. Elle achète et revend des parfums et des assiettes 555, à toutes personnes à Lomé et dans ses marchés environnants. Elle achète ces produits au Grand marché de Lomé. Elle travaille seule. 
Odette a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des parfums et des assiettes. Elle veut réinvestir les profits supplémentaires dans son commerce. 
Dans les prochaines années, Odette voudrait avoir un magasin de vente. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, Elle prévoit avoir une vie heureuse.
texts.en:
Odette is a 31-year-old woman. She is unmarried.
Odette has worked as a retailer since 2005. She buys and re-sells perfumes and '555' brand plates to all types of customers in Lomé and in the surrounding markets. She buys her goods at the grand market in Lomé. She works by herself.
Odette has requested her first loan from WAGES in order to buy perfumes and plates. She wants to reinvest her supplementary profits in her business.
In the coming years, Odette would like to have a sales store. She says that with her profits, she foresees having a happy life.

loans.use: To buy perfumes and plates.

loans.name: Cremositas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “CREMOSITAS” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal Patacamaya, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva de la cual la señora Lourdes que es la presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: Venta de mercadería, venta de ropa, tienda de barrio y frial, librería, atención de fotocopias y juegos en máquinas.

La señora Lourdes  indica que es la primera ves que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institución por invitación de una amiga de su congregación. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tienda de venta de materiales educativos que viene trabajando hace tres años atrás, aprendiendo el mismo de un amigo.

El préstamo que sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de material educativo) que adquirirá de La Paz y posteriormente lo venderá en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella es soltera y tiene un hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación en crédito y el consultorio.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Cremositas" will start their first loan cycle with Pro Mujer (Kiva Field Partner) as part of Centro Focal Patacamaya. It is formed by eight members and it is directed by a board of directors which is led by Lourdes, the president of the group. The businesses held by the members of the communal bank are various. Among them are: merchandise sales, clothing sales, community store and fast food stall, book store, photocopies, and video games.

Lourdes indicates that it is her first time working with Pro Mujer and she joined the institution following an invitation from a friend in her community. She currently has a store selling educational materials and she has had it for three years. She learned the business from a friend.

The loan that she will take will be used to increase her capital (to purchase educational materials). She will acquire her products in La Paz and she will later sell them from her sales stand. This form of work helps her to generate an income to support her family. She is single and she has a son.

When she was asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she replied that she likes the credit training and the advisors.

loans.use: to purchase educational supplies.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Ricardina

texts.es: La socia Ricardina está solicitando otro préstamo para abastecerse su almacén de mercadería y desea comprar alimentos no perecibles como por ejemplo fideos, arroz, azúcar, conservas, aceite, chocolates, galletas, leche evaporada, harina de trigo, avena y lentejas. El anterior crédito a la socia le ayudo en el negocio y pudo preparar más platos de comida por lo tanto tuvo mayores ventas y obtuvo buenas ganancias de la cuales lo destino para la alimentación y educación de sus hijos. La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Ricardina requests a subsequent loan to supply her inventory with merchandise. She wants to purchase non-perishable foods such as pastas, rice, sugar, preserves, cooking oil, chocolate, cookies, canned milk, wheat flour, oatmeal, and lentils. The previous loan helped her in her business and she was able to prepare more food which translated into increased sales and profits.

Her earnings were put towards the nutrition and education of her children. She is happy for this loan and she is committed to making her loan payments.

loans.use: to purchase non-perishable food items.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”LAS EMPRENDEDORAS DE ANDAHUAYLILLAS”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Andahuaylillas en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Rosa; La socia tiene 37 años de edad, la socia es conviviente, la socia tiene 1 hijo de 12 años de edad, la socia trabaja atendiendo su salón de belleza, la socia es cosmetóloga y ella también  desea implementar su salón de belleza y también desea invertir   en el espacio que puso en su mismo local de venta de perfumes, peluches, y un poco de bazar. La socia invierte lo que ingresa de su negocio en el pago de estudios de su menor hijo y en esta ocasión desea implementar su salón de belleza y su tienda bazar ella comprara peluches para navidad, regalos, juguetes, papel de regalo entre otros y mejorara su salón de belleza con mejores peines, cepillos, ruleros, secadoras de cabellos entre otros. La socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de regalso para su bazar y de productos para su salon de belleza.
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank "Las Emprendedoras de Andahuaylillas". The communal bank is located in the district of Andahuaylillas, in the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

Her name is Rosa. She is 37 years old and she is married common-law. She has a 12-year old son. She has a beauty shop and she is a cosmetologist. She also wants to supply her beauty salon and she wants to invest in the sale of perfumes, stuffed toys, and some general merchandise, all in the same store space. She invests what she earns from her business in her son's education. At this time she wants to supply her beauty salon and her general store with the purchase of stuffed toys for Christmas, gifts, toys, wrapping papers and other products. She will also improve her beauty salon with better combs, brushes, rolls, hair dryers and other products. She requests a loan to invest in the purchase of gifts for her general store and products for her beauty salon.

She is thankful for the loan and she is committed to making her loan payments according the agreed payment schedule.

loans.use: to purchase gifts for her general store and products for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Kossiwa

texts.fr:
Kossiwa est une femme âgée de 47 ans. Elle est mariée à un chauffeur, et est mère de 4 enfants.  
Kossiwa travaille comme restauratrice depuis 2007. Elle  prépare et sert à ces clients des plats de riz et de pate à base du maïs, dans l’enceinte de la société Mèche Amina. Elle achète les produits au grand marché de Lomé. Elle travaille seule. 
Kossiwa a requis son quatrième crédit de  WAGES afin d’acheter du maïs, du riz et du charbon de bois. Elle veut avec les profits supplémentaires, agrandir son activité.  
Dans les prochaines années, Kossiwa voudrait ouvrir un autre point de vente. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, Elle prévoit contribuer au bien être de la famille.
texts.en:
Kossiwa is a 47-year-old woman. She is married to a driver and has four children.
Kossiwa has prepared and sold food since 2007. She prepares and serves rice and maize dishes to her clients under the organization Mèche Amina. She buys her goods at the grand market in Lomé. She works by herself.
Kossiwa has requested her fourth loan from WAGES in order to buy maize, rice, and charcoal. With her supplementary profits, she wants to expand her business.
In the coming years, Kossiwa would like to open a second sales location. She says that with her profits, she foresees being able to contribute to the well-being of her family.

loans.use: To buy maize, bags of charcoal, and rice.

loans.name: Boaz

texts.en: Boaz is a married man.  He describes himself as a focused business man. For the last two years, he has been selling shoes to make a living. He is also employed as a caretaker. He has employed one person to help him manage the business.  In the next 5 years, he wants to expand his business.  Boaz dreams of managing a boutique in the future.  He is requesting for a loan of 20,000 Kenyan shillings to buy shoes for resale.

loans.use: buy shoes to resell

loans.name: Sara De Jesus

texts.es:
Sara, vive con su familia, su esposo y una hija; Sara administra una tienda D. productos domésticos, este surgió por iniciativa propia, para tener ingresos y sin salir D. casa, atendiendo todo el día tanto los quehaceres del hogar como el negocio.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para comprar arroz, maíz, frijoles, café, para tener a disponibilidad D. los clientes, esta inversión le aumentara la disponibilidad en el negocio para atender la demanda.
La aspiración D. Sara es crecer en el negocio, ser buen cliente, y proveer para su familia ingresos que solventen necesidades.
texts.en:
Sara lives with her family, her husband and a daughter.  She runs a store selling household products.  This business came about through her own initiative as she wanted to make income without leaving the house so that she could spend the day carrying out her household chores as well as running her business. 

Sara is currently requesting a loan to buy rice, corn, beans and coffee to have these products available for her customers.  This investment will increase her availability of products so that she can meet demand.

Sara's aspiration is to grow her business, be a good client and proviD. her family with income to cover their needs.

loans.use: to buy rice, corn, beans and coffee

loans.name: Giuli

texts.en:
Giuli is from the village Gudaleti, Kaspi District. She is 60 years old and lives with her husband Ivane. Giuli works as a teacher in a local school.

Besides her regular job, she is also actively involved in the functioning of the family dairy farm, which is the main source of the income for the family. They have two milk cows and produce cheese. She sells milk and cheese in Tbilisi (the capital city of the country) and Kaspi. The total average monthly income of the family is 900 Georgia Laris (GEL), approximately 540 USD.

Giuli requested credit to purchase a milk cow. This will increase sales of dairy products by 50%. She will use increased income for purchasing necessary household goods in order to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase a milk cow for expansion of the family dairy farm.

loans.name: Akouvi

texts.fr:
Akouvi est une femme âgée de 25  ans. Elle est mariée à un revendeur et n’a pas encore d’enfant.  
Akouvi travaille comme employée dans une société de la place, mais depuis 2008, elle exerce parallèlement à cette activité le commerce. Elle achète et revend des mèches, des produits cosmétiques et autres à toutes les femmes désireuses, dans une boutique non loin de la pharmacie DEO GRATIAS à Lomé. Elle achète les produits à Lomé ; auprès des grossistes. Elle emploie une personne 
Akouvi a requis son deuxième crédit de 500.000FCFA de  WAGES afin d’opérer des achats pour renforcer son commerce. Elle veut avec les profits supplémentaires développer son commerce. 
Dans les prochaines années, Akouvi voudrait agrandir sa boutique. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, Elle prévoit  contribuer au besoin du foyer.
texts.en:
Akouvi is a 25-year-old woman. She is married to a retailer and does not have any children yet.
Akouvi works for a local company, but since 2008, she has also run a business on the side. She buys and re-sells hair extensions, cosmetics, and other items to female customers who want them at a store not far from the "Deo Gratias" pharmacy in Lomé. She buys her goods from wholesalers in Lomé. She employs one additional person.
Akouvi has requested her second loan of 500,000 FCFA from WAGES in order to make her purchases to strengthen her business. With her supplementary profits, she wants to develop her business.
In the coming years, Akouvi would like to expand her store. She says that with her profits, she foresees contributing to providing for her household.

loans.use: To buy hair extensions, cosmetics, and other items.

loans.name: Florentina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”QOLQUEWASI”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Florentina; La socia tiene 45 años de edad, la socia es casada, la socia tiene 3 hijos, la socia tiene una tienda de abarrotes y la socia desea invertir en la compra de productos de primera necesidad, la socia desea invertir el crédito en la compra de arroz al por mayor, compra de azúcar en bolsas, compra de fideos, leche por cajas, panetones, galletas, mazamorras, harinas. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, fideos, leche y otros. 
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank "Qolquewasi". The communal bank is located in the district of Huanchac, in the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

Her name is Florentina. She is 45 years old, married, and she has 3 children. She has a grocery store and she wishes to invest in the purchase of basic consumer goods. She wants to invest her loan in the purchase of rice in wholesale, sacks of sugar, pastas, boxes of milk, pastries, cookies, puddings, and flour. She requests the loan to invest in the purchase of basic consumer goods such as rice, sugar, pasta, and milk, etc.

She is thankful for the loan and she is committed to making her loan payments according to the agreed payment schedule.

loans.use: to purchase basic consumer goods such as rice, sugar, pasta, milk, etc.

loans.name: Luis Alonso

texts.es:
Luis, se dedica a la agricultura y albañilería, vive con su esposa y dos hijos, todos trabajan, su ocupación es en la tierra sembrando maíz y frijol, desde joven inicio este oficio, fue su padre quien se lo enseño, no tiene un horario fijo, porque atiende también la albañilería, construyendo y mejorando viviendas.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de abono, ya que tiene una siembra pequeña de maíz, y necesita fortalecerla con este material, para que resista y pueda producir abundantemente.
La aspiración de Luis es que su cosecha sea abundante y sana, que con este resultado le pueda garantizar alimentación a su familia.
texts.en:
Luis is a farmer and builder.  He lives with his wife and two children.  They all work.  Luis works the land, sowing corn and beans.  He started this work when he was young as his father taught him.  He does not work regular hours because he also works in the building trade, building and improving houses.

Luis is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer as he has a small corn crop which he needs to strengthen with this material so that it survives and can produce abundantly.

Luis' aspiration is to enjoy an abundant and healthy harvest.  This result will enable him to guarantee food for his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for his corn crop

loans.name: Folly

texts.fr:
Folly est un homme âgé de 44 ans. Il est célibataire.  
Folly travaille comme revendeur depuis 2003. Il achète et revend en gros des cartes de recharges pour téléphone, et du pure water (eau minérale en sachet) à toutes personnes dans une boutique sise à Lomé. Il achète les produits à Lomé auprès d’autres grossistes. Il travaille seul dans sa boutique.
Folly a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des cartes de recharge et du pure water en gros destinés à la vente. Il veut réinvestir les profits supplémentaires de son activité dans l’agrandissement de sa boutique. 
Dans les prochaines années, Folly voudrait diversifier ses marchandises. Il dit qu’avec les profits, Il prévoit s’assurer une autonomie financière.
texts.en:
Folly is a 44-year-old man. He is unmarried.
Folly has worked as a retailer since 2003. He buys and sells rechargeable phone cards and "Pure Water" (mineral water sold in packets) in bulk to all types of customers at a store located in Lomé. He buys his goods from other wholesalers in Lomé. He works by himself at his store.
Folly has requested his first loan from WAGES in order to buy rechargeable phone cards and "Pure Water" in bulk for resale. He wants to reinvest his supplementary profits in his business in order to expand his store.
In the coming years, Folly would like to diversify his merchandise. He says that with his profits, he foresees ensuring his financial independence.

loans.use: To buy rechargeable phone cards and packets of "Pure Water".

loans.name: Flor Alejandrina

texts.es:
Flor, necesita nuevamente un préstamo, por eso se decide a solicitarlo, ya que además que recibe una buena atención. Este préstamo lo invertirá en compra de arroz, aceite, embutidos, huevos, para el negocio, estos préstamos le sirven muchísimo para mejorar la atención de la clientela, ofreciendo un amplio número de productos.
Estas inversiones la han ayudado para mejorar los ingresos a su hogar, cubriendo las necesidades cotidianas.
texts.en:
Flor needs a new loan and so decided to request one as she receives a good service.  She will invest this loan in buying rice, oil, cold cuts and eggs for her business.  These loans are very helpful as they enable her to improve her customer service and offer her customers a wide range of products.

These investments have helped Flor to improve her household income and cover her daily needs.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil, cold cuts and eggs

loans.name: Percy

texts.es: El socio Percy está solicitando otro préstamo para mejorar los equipos médicos de su consultorio. El anterior crédito al socio Percy le ayudo a comprar más equipos médicos y así pudo brindar una mejorar atención a sus clientes, él obtuvo buenas ganancias de la cuales lo destino para la alimentación y para los gastos del hogar. El socio Percy está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos.
texts.en: Percy requests another loan to improve the medical equipment of his clinic. The previous loan requested by Percy helped him to purchase more medical equipment. He was then able to provide his clients with a better level care. He obtained good profits which he used towards the nutrition of his family and to cover the household expenses. Percy is happy for this loan and he is committed to making his loan payments.

loans.use: to purchase medical equipment.

loans.name: Emibel

texts.en:
Emibel is originally from Puerto Rico and has been in the beauty salon business for more than 20 years. Her salon, Le Cache Salon, has been successfully operating for 4 years. The welcoming environment of the salon pulls in customers of every ethnicity, from the lower class to the upper middle class. Emibel says her clients come as far as New Jersey to experience her services. Those services include--but are not limited to--hair extensions, keratin treatment, Japanese relaxers, hair coloring and styling. Emibel has employed four hair stylists, two full-time and two part-time.

This loan will allow Emibel to purchase a chemical fumes extractor, which will help her protect herself, her customers and her employees from the potentially harmful chemicals that she uses daily in the salon. Also, she will purchase another chair and materials to extend her services to waxing and facials.

loans.use: To pay for a chemical fumes extractor and materials for facials and waxing.

loans.name: Margaritas De San Antonio Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “MARGARITAS DE SAN ANTONIO” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Senkata, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Olga. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: cultivo de papa, cría de animales, venta de chuño, artesanía en tejido.

La señora Olga  indica que este es el primer ciclo que trabaja con Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una promotora. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de crianza de ganado que viene trabajando hace años atrás, aprendo este oficio de su mamá. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra alimento para su ganado) que comprará de la Ceja y posteriormente lo repartirá a su ganado. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia pues ella es casada  y tiene cuatro hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el ahorro.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Margaritas de San Antonio" will start their first loan cycle with Pro Mujer (Kiva Field Partner) as part of Centro Senkata. It is formed by eight members and it is directed by a board of directors, which is led by Olga. The businesses carried by the members of this communal bank are various, and among them are: potato farming, livestock farming, freeze-dried potatoes, and knitted crafts.

Olga indicates that this is the first loan cycle in which she works with Pro Mujer. She joined following an invitation by a promoter. She currently has a business raising cattle and she has had this business for many years. She learned the business from her mother.

The loan that she will take is to increase her capital, to purchase feed for her cattle. She will make her purchases in Ceja and she will later distribute the product among her cattle. This form of work helps her to generate an income to support her family in whatever possible. She is married and she has four children.

When she was asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she replied that she likes the savings program.

loans.use: to purchase cattle feed.

loans.name: Luz Aydee

texts.es:
A sus 36 años de edad Aydee es una madre consagrada a su familia, día a día se levanta con la ilusión de sacar su negocio adelante para brindarle a su familia estabilidad económica ya que actualmente su esposo no cuenta con un empleo estable, lo que ha hecho que desde hace varios meses Aydee genere los ingresos básicos para las necesidades del hogar.

Aydee produce y comercializa alimentos, específicamente dulces como: colombinas ácidas, crispetas acarameladas, lecheritas, y otros productos que son de gran demanda en los colegios del municipio de Bello, su labor es preparar estos productos y venderlos en las tiendas de los diferentes colegios. Sin embargo no siempre puede tener la cantidad suficiente de productos que requieren sus clientes, es por tal motivo que hoy Aydee ve la necesidad de comprar mas insumos con los cuales aumentar la capacidad de producción, pues comprando los ingredientes necesarios para la preparación de los dulces al por mayor, no sólo podrá aumentar la cantidad si no también sus ingresos, pero actualmente Aydee no cuenta con el capital necesario para la compra de los insumos, por  lo que solicita un crédito que permita hacer dichas compras y proporcionalmente mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
At the age of 36 Aydee is a mother who is devoted to her family. Day after day she wakes up with the goal of moving her business forward in order to provide her family with financial stability, especially because her husband does not have stable employment. This is what Aydee has done for several months in order to generate a basic income for the needs of the home.

Aydee prepares and sells foods, specifically sweets, such as: sweet and sour candy, caramel popcorn, caramels, and other products. They are in high demand in the schools of the municipality of Bello. Her work consists of preparing these products and selling them to the stores in the different schools. She is not always able to sell the quantity of products required by her clients. For this reason Aydee now sees the need to purchase more ingredients in order to increase production capacity. When purchasing the ingredients she needs in wholesale, it will not only help her increase quantity but also her profits. But Aydee does not have the necessary capital to purchase the ingredients, which is hwy she requests a loan. It will help her to make these purchases and consequently to improve the quality of her life.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients to prepare foods.

loans.name: Felix

texts.es: Félix tiene 50 años, esta casado con Herlinda de 50 años, fruto de ese amor tienen 02 hijos, quienes son estudiantes. Juntos habitan en su casa propia. Félix, es un hombre muy trabajador y activo, se dedica al cultivo de cacao y café. Es así que cada mañana se levanta muy temprano para ir a sus campos de cultivo, viene trabajando hace 30 años y es conocedor del arduo trabajo que realiza. Félix en los tiempos de cosecha busca ayuda de peones para realizar este trabajo. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es sembrar junto a su familia quienes le dan aliento y ganas para seguir adelante y considera que lo mas difícil es combatir la plaga de insectos  que dañan sus cultivos, pero aún así piensa ampliar la siembra de cacao y café, porque es la manera más rentable con la que puede solventar los estudios de sus hijos. Este es su séptimo crédito con MFP, sabe que este aporte le será de mucha utilidad en el progreso de su trabajo. En su banco comunal es participe en todas las reuniones que se realiza. Con los 2,500 soles que solicita, podrá sembrar más cacao y café, para ello necesitará comprar semillas y contratar peones.
texts.en: Felix is 50 years old and he is married to Herlinda, 50 years old. As a fruit of their love they have 2 children, both of whom attend school. They work together in their own house. Felix is a very hardworking and active man. He is dedicated to the cultivation of cocoa and coffee. Every morning he starts his day very early to set out to his farm land. He has been working for 30 years and he is an expert of the arduous work that he carries out. During the harvest season Felix hires farm hands to help him complete the task. What he work enjoys about his work is planting seeds together with his family. They give him the strength and desire to move forward. He considers the most difficult part of his work to be battling against insect plagues that damage the cultivation. But despite that, he still plans on expanding his cocoa and coffee plantation. This is the most profitable way for him to be able to cover his children's schooling expenses. This is his seventh loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner). He knows that his influx will be of great help in the progress of his business. He participates in every meeting held by his communal bank. With the 2,500 nuevos soles which he requests he will be able to sow more cocoa and coffee. He will need to buy seed and to hire farm hands.

loans.use: to purchase cocoa and coffee seeds, and to hire farm hands.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy soda, juice, snacks, cookies, rice, beans and toilet paper

loans.name: Akouvi

texts.fr:
Akouvi est une femme  âgé(e) de 30 ans. Elle est célibataire.
Akouvi travaille comme revendeuse d’alimentation générale depuis 2009.  Elle à une boutique dans laquelle elle vend des boissons et des produits d’alimentation générale  après achat  à LOME. Une personne l’aide dans l’exercice de son activité.
Akouvi a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des produits d’alimentation générale. Elle veut augmenter la marchandise avec le profit réalisé. 
Dans les prochaines années, Akouvi voudrait avoir une autre boutique de vente d’alimentation  dans un autre quartier.
texts.en:
Akouvi, age 30, is unmarried. She's been reselling food products since 2009. She has a store where she sells beverages and food products that she buys in Lomé. She has one person helping her with her business.

Akouvi is seeking her first loan from Kiva's partner, WAGES, in order to buy food products. She wants to bolster her stock with her profits. In the forthcoming years, Akouvi would like to open a grocery store in a different neighborhood.

loans.use: to buy food products and liquors

loans.name: Fanni Rosa

texts.es: El socio Fanni está solicitando otro préstamo para comprar mercadería pues se está acercando campaña navideña entonces desea comprar ropa como por ejemplo chompas y peluches. El anterior crédito a la socia Fanni le ayudo a pagar deudas que le había generado la anterior campaña navideña, ella se encuentra muy tranquila y feliz pues el banco comunal tiene confianza en ella y pudo acceder nuevamente al micro crédito. La socia Fanni está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos.
texts.en: Fanni is requesting another loan to buy merchandise as the Christmas season is getting close and she wants to buy clothing such as sweaters, and stuffed animals.  Fanni used her previous loan to pay off the debt she generated the previous Christmas season.  She is very content and happy because her communal bank has confidence in her and she was able to access another micro loan.  Fanni is happy about the loan and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: purchase merchandise such as sweaters and stuffed animals for the holiday season.

loans.name: Agustina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”QOLQUEWASI”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Agustina; La socia tiene 51 años de edad, la socia es soltera, la socia tiene una tienda de abarrotes la socia desea implementar su tienda de abarrotes y comprar arroz, azúcar, fideos, aceite por bidones entre otros productos; la socia invertirá su crédito para comprar estos productos y también panetones, la socia también acomodo un espacio en su tienda en la misma puerta y tiene pasto fresco para la venta, ella también cría animales menores como cuyes; la socia con lo que ingresa de dinero ella invierte en las mejoras de su vivienda. La socia solicita  el préstamo para invertir en la compra de productos de primera necesidad, en la compra de panetones y otros. 
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Señora Agustina belongs to the communal bank "QOLQUEWASI" located in the district of Huanchac and the province and department of Cusco.  

She is 51 years old, single and owns a grocery store.  She wants to stock her grocery store and buy rice, sugar, noodles, large containers of oil, etc.  She will use the loan to invest in these products as well as panetones [Christmas cakes].  She also made a space in her store where she has fresh grass for sale.  She also raises small animals such as guinea pigs.  She invests the money she earns in improvements for her home.  She is requesting a loan to buy basic necessity products, panetones, etc.  

She is grateful for the loan and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: purchase basic necessity products such as rice, sugar, noodles and oil as well as panetones.

loans.name: Maria Dolores

texts.es:
María, se decide por un nuevo préstamo, porque ya tiene un historial con la institución, porque es menos difícil para renovarlo, y además la oportunidad de comprar cerdos, ella ha logrado adelantar en el préstamo para poder acceder a una nueva inversión para el negocio.
Comprara cerdos, concentrado y maicillo, para la granja, esperando que esta nueva deuda la pueda manejar con responsabilidad y sin atrasos.
texts.en:
María decided on a new loan because she already has a record with the institution.  It's less difficult to renew it and an opportunity to buy pigs.  She has managed to get ahead with the loan to gain access to a new investment for her business.

She will buy pigs, feed, and millet for the farm.  She is hoping that she can manage this new debt responsibly and punctually.

loans.use: to buy pigs, feed, and millet.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Leticia

texts.es: Leticia es una mujer muy emprendedora que cuenta con su propio negocio de abarrotes desde hace 7 años; donde ofrece a sus cliente abarrotes en general como botanas, refrescos y más todo para la necesidad del cliente. Leticia solo tiene un hijo que depende de ella  que se encuentra estudiando la universidad y aparte trabaja, por tal motivo opto por trabajar en su propia casa para atender a el y a su esposo sin ningún problema. Su esposo le ayuda por las tardes para que ella realice sus actividad domesticas sin ninguna distracción. Para que su negocio sea prosperado necesita comprar mercancía para el negocio como abarrotes, refrescos, botanas y mas.
texts.en:
Leticia is a very entrepreneurial woman who has had her own grocery store business for the last seven years.  She offers her customers groceries in general, such as snacks, sodas,and everything her customers need.  

Leticia has just one son as a dependent; he is studying at university and also works.  For this reason, she chose to work in her own home so she can easily look after him and her husband.

Her husband helps her in the evenings so that she can take care of her housework without any distraction.

In order for her business to prosper, she needs to buy merchandise for her store, such as groceries, sodas, snacks and other things.

loans.use: to buy groceries, sodas, and other things for her business.

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es: Hilda, es una mujer trabajadora, tiene 35 años de edad, convive con Yover de 32 años. Juntos habitan en su casa propia en compañía de sus 03 hijos, quienes son estudiantes. Hace 04 años, Hilda, se dedica a la agricultura, es asdí que su día laborar empieza desde muy temprano, alistandio a sus hijos para que vayan al colegio, para luego dirigirse a sus campos agrícolas en donde cultiva cacao y café. Hilda es una mujer a quien le gusta el trabajo que realiza pues lo considera rentable, sin embargo hay momentos en que la economía no alcanza, ya que tiene que pagar a los peones que le ayudan en la cosecha y así como derivarlos en los gastos de su hogar. Pero aun así esta dispuesta a sembrar más café, para cubrir sus necesidaes. Este es su tercer crédito con MFP, por el cual se compromete en seguir cumpliendo con sus obligaciones de pagos, además se siente asegurada con su banco comunal, ya que le  brinda muchos beneficios y consejos. Con los 1,500 soles que solicita, piensa invertir en la compra de plantas de café, con la finalidad de que pueda solventar los gastos de su hogar.
texts.en:
Hilda is a hard-working woman.  She is 35 years old and lives with Yover, who is 32.  Together they live in their own house with their 3 children, who are students.  Hilda has been working in agriculture for 4 years.  Her work day starts very early.  She gets her kids ready for school and then, she goes to the field to work where she grows cocoa and coffee.  Hilda is a woman who likes to work as she considers it profitable, however, there are times when she can't make ends meet as she has to pay workers to help her harvest her crops as well as her household expenses.  She is willing to plant more coffee to cover her necessities.  

This is her third loan with MFP and she is committed to fulfilling her payment obligations.  She also feels reassured by her communal bank as they offer her a lot of benefits and advice.  She plans to invest the 1500 soles [Peruvian currency] that she is requesting in the purchase of coffee plants so she can meet her household expenses.

loans.use: purchase more coffee plants.

loans.name: Lucila

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ”QOLQUEWASI”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Lucila; La socia tiene 49 años de edad, la socia es soltera, la socia trabaja en una institución del estado como personal público, ella también se dedica paralelamente a esto a la compra y venta por catálogos de cosméticos, la socia ofrece sus productos de belleza como perfumes, lápiz de labios, rímel, sombras entre otros productos a sus amistades y compañeras de trabajo y ellas le hacen los diferentes pedidos una vez que llega los productos la socia les reparte y en dos partes le van pagando el costo de los productos y nuevamente en dos semanas tienen un nuevo catalogo para otro grupo de productos. La socia desea invertir el préstamo en la compra de productos de belleza de sus catálogos que están en oferta para tener en su almacén y venderlos. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de productos de belleza.
La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the ”QOLQUEWASI” communal bank.  This communal bank is located in Huanchac district, in the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.

This member is Señora Lucila; she is 49 years old and single.  She works for a state organization as a public personnel member, and she also works in parallel buying and selling from cosmetics catalogs.  The member offers beauty products for sale to her friends and work colleagues, such as perfumes, lipstick, mascara, and eye-shadow among other things.  Her customers place various orders, and once Lucila has the products, she delivers them and the purchasers pay for them in two installments.  In another two weeks, they get a new catalog with another set of products.

This member wants to invest the loan in purchasing the beauty products that are on offer from her catalogs, so that she can have them in her storeroom and sell them.  The member is requesting the loan to invest in purchasing beauty products.

The member is grateful for the loan and commits to making her repayments on schedule.

loans.use: to invest in purchasing beauty products.

loans.name: Lylian Del Carmen

texts.es:
Lylian, vive con sus hijas, es madre soltera, todas trabajan, ella por su parte administra una tienda, esta surgió por iniciativa propia, la tiene instalada en su vivienda,  ofrece productos de uso domestico, lo más demandado por los hogares, no hay un horario especifico para atender a la clientela.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de bebidas, jugos, gaseosas, boquitas, galletas, dulces, toda la mayor mercadería que es demandada, esta inversión le ayudara para crecer en el inventario, estar preparada para satisfacer las exigencias de los clientes.
Su aspiración es que con el paso del tiempo, con ayuda de préstamos, pueda su negocio crecer, y que sus hijas estabilicen sus vidas.
texts.en:
Lylian is a single mother.  She lives with her daughters, all of whom work.  For her part, she manages a store, a business that came up on her own initiative.  She has it in her home and offers products for home use, the most in demand for the home.  She doesn't have a specific schedule for waiting on her customers.

Lylian is requesting a loan to buy drinks, juices, sodas, snacks, cookies, sweets--all the major products that are in demand.  This loan will help her increase her inventory and be prepared to satisfy the demands of the customers.

Her goal is that in time, with the help of loans, her business will be able to grow, and that her daughters stabilize their lives.

loans.use: to buy drinks, juices, sodas, snacks, cookies, and sweets.

loans.name: David

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal ”QOLQUEWASI”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es él Sr. David; El socio es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos el socio es técnico dental de profesión, y  también se dedica  a la compra y venta de insumos forestales, el socio también tiene junto a su conyugue una tienda de abarrotes, el socio en esta oportunidad desea el crédito para invertir en la compra de productos de primera necesidad para implementar la tienda que tiene con su conyugue; el socio invertirá en la compra de panetones, vinos, champan, galletas, harinas, leche por cajas, fideos, azúcar y arroz. El socio solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de productos de primera necesidad.

El socio agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the ”QOLQUEWASI” communal bank.  This communal bank is located in the district of Huanchac, in the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

This member is Señor David.  He is in a live-in relationship, and has two children.  He is a dental technician by profession, and also works buying and selling forestry supplies.  In addition, the member runs a small grocery store with his partner.

On this occasion, the member wants the loan to invest in purchasing every day products to stock up his and his partner's store.  He will invest in purchasing panetone cakes, wine, champagne, cookies, flour, cartons of milk, noodles, sugar and rice.  The member is requesting the loan to invest in purchasing everyday products.  

The member is grateful for the loan, and commits to making her repayments on schedule.

loans.use: to invest in purchasing everyday products.

loans.name: Acatjamata Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “ACATJAMATA” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal Patacamaya, está compuesta por doce integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva de la cual la señora Lidia es la presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de leche y queso, venta de leche.

La señora Lidia  indica que es la primera ves que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institución por invitación de una promotora. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de elaboración de queso que viene trabajando hace treinta y tres años atrás, aprendiendo el mismo de sus vecinos.

El préstamo que sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de material para la elaboración de queso) que adquirirá de La Paz y posterior a la elaboración lo venderá en las ferias. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella es casada y tiene cuatro hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación en crédito.

En la foto no esta presente una de las socias por razones culturales, ella es la mseñora María
texts.en:
The “ACATJAMATA” communal bank is starting its first lending cycle with Pro Mujer.  This group is made up of twelve members, and is led by a board of directors with Señora Lidia as the president.  The businesses that these communal bank members are progressing are varied, including selling milk and cheese, and selling milk.

Señora Lidia states that this is the first time that she is working with Pro Mujer, and that she joined the institution at the invitation of one of the promoters.  She currently has a business making cheese, which she has been doing for the last 33 years.  She learned this trade from her neighbors.

The loan that she is looking for is to grow her capital by purchasing materials for making cheese, which she will acquire in La Paz, and after making the cheese she will sell it at the markets.  This form of work allows her to earn income to support her family, as she is married and has four children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she replies that she enjoys the training about credit.

One of the members, Señora María, isn't present in the photo for cultural reasons.

loans.use: to buy materials for making cheese.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es: Isabel, de 46 años de edad; es una mujer separada, vive en su casa propia, ya que sus hijos son mayores de edad e independientes. Hace 15 años monto un negocio, con un Bar - Restaurante, y en ella cuenta con personal que atiende a la clientela. Pues para ella es importante que sus clientes estén satisfechos con la visita a su establecimiento. A Isabel, le gusta la actividad que realiza ya que le es rentable y es la manera más fácil de poder asegurar su calidad de vida, sin emnbargo es difícil no poder contar con una refrigeradora para mantener frescos los alimentos, como: verduras, carnes, entre otros alimentos. Aún así no pierde las esperanzas de hacer sus sueños realidad y lograr comprarse una refrigeradora. Este será su primer crédito con MFP y esta apta a pagar sus cuotas puntualmente ya que desea acceder a otros préstamos posteriormente. Con los 1,500 soles que solicita podrá comprar una refrigeradora que le será útil en su Bar – Restaurante.
texts.en:
Isabel,aged 46, is separated from her husband and lives in her own home as her children are grown and financially independent.  For the last 15 years, she has had a Bar-Restaurant business, where she has staff who serve her customers.  It's important to her that her customers are satisfied with their visit to her establishment.  

Isabel enjoys her work, as it is profitable and the easiest way to be able to secure her quality of life.  However, it is difficult to keep her food, such as vegetables and meat among other things, fresh as she does not have a refrigerator.  She has not lost hope in making her dreams reality and being able to buy herself a refrigerator.  

This will be her first loan with MFP, and she is ready to make her repayments punctually as she wants to be able to get additional loans later on.

With the 1,500 Soles that she is requesting, she will be able to purchase a refrigerator that will be very useful for her Bar-Restaurant.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator.

loans.name: Ysmael

texts.es: Ismael tiene  21 años, es un joven responsable. Vive en el anexo de Huaytacorral; en compañía de su hermana Eva, con quien cuidan la casa de sus padres, puestA pesar de su corta edad, este joven trabajador tiene 6 años de experiencia en la siembra de maca y papa. Desde que era niño sus padres le enseñaron a trabajar en el campo así como fertilizar la tierra, herramientas que luego lo estaría aplicando actualmente en sus  4 hectáreas de terreno productivo.  “todavía no tengo terrenos propios, éstos son de la comunidad, pero muy pronto compraré unos”, afirma. Lo cosechado es vendido en la feria de la comunidad de Acostambo  durante los días viernes de cada semana. Además vende maca seca a una empresa procesadora de maca, que exporta este producto, pues tienen acogida por sus componentes nutricionales.   Ahora espera mejorar la calidad de sus tierras para así aumentar la producción de maca y papa. Él pertenece al grupo solidario “Los ángeles” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde espera del apoyo de todos ustedes, pues tiene muchos planes para su futuro. Además promete ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas. Ismael de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de 3 kilos de semilla de maca que cuesta un promedio de S/. 300 soles por kilo. o que ellos se encuentran trabajando en otra zona.
texts.en:
Ismael, 21, is a responsible young man.  He lives in the community of Huaytacorral with his sister Eva; together they take care of their parents' house, since their parents are working in another area.

Despite his young age, this young worker has six years of experience growing maca (an Andean root) and potatoes.  Since he was a child his parents taught him how to work in the field as well as to fertilize the land, tools that later he would be applying, currently on his four hectares of productive land.  "I still don't have land of my own, this belongs to the community, but very soon I will buy some," he affirms.

He sells the harvest every Friday in the market in the community of Acostambo.  He also sells dried maca to a maca-processing business that exports the product since it is well received for its nutritional components.  Now he hopes to improve the quality of his land to increase the yield of maca and potatoes.

Ismael belongs to the Los Angeles solidarity group and this is his first loan with MFP.  He hopes for the support of all of you, since he has many plans for his future.  In addition, he promises to be punctual in making his payments.

Upon receiving the support, Ismael will use the requested money to buy three kilos of maca seed, which costs an average of 300 PEN per kilo.

loans.use: to buy three kilos of maca seed.

loans.name: Jose Ramon

texts.es:
José, es agricultor, dedicado a la producción de frijoles y maíz, además tiene ganado en sus tierras, su grupo familiar está compuesto por su esposa y tres hijos, él aprendió de pequeño todo el trabajo, pues siempre acompaño a su padre para poder conocer  y dedicarse a esta actividad.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas, como abono y herbicidas, pues está sembrando maíz y frijol, la compra de estos materiales le ayudara para proteger y fortalecer la siembra.
El quiere con el préstamo mejorar la producción en sus cultivos, para que al momento de sacar los frutos pueda vender para generar ganancias, colaborando con el progreso de su hogar.
texts.en:
José, a farmer, grows beans and corn.  He also has cattle on his land.  His family consists of his wife and three children.  He learned the job when he was a little boy, since he always went with his father to be able to learn and dedicate himself to this work.

Currently he is requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies like fertilizer and herbicides, since he is growing corn and beans.  The purchase of these materials will help him protect and strengthen the harvest.

With the loan he wants to improve his crop production.  When the crops are ready he can sell to generate earnings, contributing to the progress of his home.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and herbicides.

loans.name: Marleny

texts.es:
A sus 48 años de edad Marleny es una mujer emprendedora que a raíz de su separación decidió valerse por si misma y sacar a sus 2 hijas adelante, hoy en día una de sus hijas está casada y la otra se dedica a apoyar a su madre en todos sus proyectos, como actualmente que con la ilusión de tener un ingreso fijo, Marleny quiere montar un negocio donde venda comidas rápidas pues desde hace 5 años ha trabajado para varias personas en esta labor por lo que ha adquirido la experiencia necesaria para sacar adelante un negocio propio.

Marleny debe comprar un puesto donde ofrecer la comida e insumos para la preparación de la misma, por lo que solicita un préstamo con el cual realizar estas compras, pues hoy no cuenta con el capital necesario para emprender este proyecto. Sueña con tener estabilidad económica, posicionar su negocio y llegar a tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
At the age of 48 Marleny is an enterprising woman who, after her separation, decided to fend for herself and to move forward with her 2 daughters. Today one of her daughters is married and the other helps her mother in all of her projects. Currently, her goal is to have a steady income so Marleny wants to set up a business from where to sell fast foods. For the past 5 years she has been working for various other people in this field and she has acquired the experience she needs to set up her own business.

Marleny wants to purchase a stand from where to sell foods and ingredients used in the preparation of these foods. To this end she requests a loan to make these purchases, as she does not currently have the necessary capital to undertake this project. She dreams of having stable finances, to position her business, and to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients to prepare food and to purchase a stand from where to sell fast foods.

loans.name: Jose Carlos

texts.es:
José, vive con su esposa y su pequeño hijo, José se dedica al destazo de ganado, lo realiza dos veces por semana, los lunes y jueves, pero acostumbra ir al tiangue en busca de buen ganado para el destazo.
Por el momento José necesita a la compra de ganado (dos vacas), por eso solicita el préstamo, para tener los fondos  y se le facilite la obtención de las reces, esto le ayudara para atender su negocio y para continuar con las ventas en el negocio.
La aspiración de José es crecer en el negocio, administrar una carnicería que ofrezca las mejores carnes.
texts.en:
José lives with his wife and their small son.  José butchers cattle.  He does this twice a week on Mondays and Thursdays.  He usually goes to the market looking for good cattle to butcher.

José now needs to buy two cows.  That is why he is requesting the loan in order to have the funds that will facilitate getting the cows.  This will help him tend to his business and to continue sales in the business.

José’s aspiration is to grow in the business and to run a butcher shop that offers the best meats.

loans.use: to buy two cows to butcher.

loans.name: Gloria Zenaida

texts.es: L. Sra. Gloria es una mujer separada tiene 2 hijos, elL. es muy  trabajadora y luchadora por lograr el bienestar para toda su familia; elL. se dedica a L. venta D. abarrotes y bebidas (arroz, azúcar, fideos, leche y gaseosas etc.), ya tiene 3 años en el negocio, gana aproximadamente S/180 nuevos soles semanales. El crédito otorgado lo va a invertir en L. compra D. una congeladora y L. compra D. más mercadería para su tienda. Sus sueños D. L. Sra. Gloria es poder darles una buena calidad D. vida a sus hijos y darles una buena educación y que sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Gloria is separated and has two children.  She is very hard-working and tenacious in order to achieve the well-being of her family.  

She sells groceries and drinks (rice, sugar, noodles, milk, and soft drinks, etc.).  She has had the business for three years, and she earns approximately 180 soles a month. 

She will use the loan she was given to buy a freezer and more merchandise for her store.

Gloria’s dreams are to be able to give her children a good quality of life, a good education, and that they become professionals.

loans.use: to buy a freezer and to stock her grocery store.

loans.name: Javier

texts.es: Javier tiene 30 años, vive en casa propia junto a su conviviente Edith, de 19 años de edad; fruto de ese amor tiene una hija de 3 añitos quien es la alegría de su hogar. La labor que realiza Javier, es el cultivo de plantas como: cacao y café; es conocedor del arduo trabajo que se realiza en el campo agrícola; donde tiene 10 años de experiencia dedicandose a sus propias tierras. Pero en temporada de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de los jornaleros quienes se encargan de recolectar los granos de café y cacao. Se siente muy comprometido con su trabajo; porque gracias a su esfuerzo cotidiano hoy disfruta al ver que sus plantas son productivas, logrando recuperar su inversión y obtener ganancias. Por otro lado se le hace difícil no poder eliminar los insectos que perjudican sus sembrios. Con el crédito solicitado realizará el mantenimiento respectivo de sus plantas y con el resto del dinero comprará sacos de abono para fertilizar sus tierras. Este es su octavo crédito con MFP y se compromete seguir aportando sus cuotas puntualmente como en los anteriores créditos. En su banco comunal es participe de las reuniones que se realiza. Con los 2,000 soles que solicita, contratará peones para que lo apoyen en el limpieza y fertilización de sus plantas, para también comprará sacos de abono.
texts.en: Javier is 30 years old and he lives in a house of his own together with his common-law wife Edith, 19 years old. The fruit of their love is a 3-year old daughter who is the joy of their home. The work that Javier carries out is the cultivation of plants, such as cocoa and coffee. He is an expert of the arduous work that he carries out in his farm land. He has 10 years' experience in cultivating his own fields. During the harvest he relies on the support of farm hands to help him collect the coffee and cocoa grains. He feels very committed to his work because it is thanks to his daily efforts that he is able to enjoy his plants as they become productive and he is able to recover his investment and earn a profit. On the other hand he finds it difficult to eliminate the insects that damage his plantations. With the requested loan he will carry out maintenance care on the respective plants and with the rest of the funds he will purchase sacks of fertilizers to fertilize his land. This is his eighth loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner) and he is committed to keep making his payments on time, as he has during his previous loans. He participates in all the meetings held by his communal bank. With the 2000 soles that he request, he will hire farm hands to help him clean and fertilize his plants, and he will also purchase sacks of fertilizers.

loans.use: to hire farm hands and to purchase sacks of fertilizers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy juices, water, and fruit to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy chickens and concentrated feed

loans.name: Omar De Jesús

texts.es:
Omar es un emprendedor que desde hace varios años se dedica a la venta de legumbres, inició vendiendo en las calles y actualmente tiene un local que le permite ofrecer mas variedad y calidad en los productos.

Se preocupar por brindar un buen servicio y hacer sentir a sus clientes satisfechos por su compra, y con la intención de cumplir a cabalidad con sus expectativas, Omar quiere comprar mas mercancía para surtir su negocio, pues es conciente que así los clientes tendrán mas variedad de productos y posicionará la legumbreria en el sector, pero no cuenta con el capital necesario, por lo que solicita un crédito que le permita mejorar las ventas y proporcionalmente sus ingresos económicos. Sueña con mejorar su calidad de vida por lo que trabaja con gran esmero por lograrlo.
texts.en:
Omar is an entrepreneur who has dedicated the last several years to the sale of vegetables. He started out selling in the streets but now he has a store. It permits him to offer a wider variety and a greater quality of products.

He concerns himself with providing a good level of service and making his clients feel satisfied with their purchases. His intention is to comply fully with their expectations so Omar wants to purchase more merchandise to supply his business. He is conscious that his clients will have a wider variety of products and it will help his vegetable store earn a spot in the sector. He doesn’t have the necessary capital, which is why he requests a loan. It will permit him to improve his sales and consequently, his profits. He dreams of improving his quality of life and he works with great diligence to achieve this.

loans.use: to purchase products to stock his vegetable store.

loans.name: Rosa Yanira

texts.es:
Rosa, se decidió por un nuevo préstamo, por la necesidad D. mejorar el servicio a los clientes, este préstamo lo utilizara en la reparación del vehículo D. trabajo y poder comprar frutas y verduras, estos préstamos le sirven para crecer en su negocio y mejorar su  calidad D. comerciante.
Rosa espera que este nuevo periodo con el nuevo préstamo, no le afecte ningún problema, para poder salir D. la deuda D. la mejor manera.
texts.en:
Rosa decided to request a new loan in order to improve the service she offers to her customers. This loan will be used for repairing the business vehicle and for purchasing fruits and vegetables. This loan will help to grow her business and to improve as a merchant.
Rosa hopes this new period with the new loan will not cause any problems, so that she can get out of debt in a better way.

loans.use: pay for repairs for her work vehicle.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.es: La Sra. Alicia esta casada y tiene dos hijos ella se dedica al comercio de afrecho por quintal, generalmente tiene clientes de granjas ya que compran este alimento para pollos como para cerdos, ella ya tiene muchos clientes, también realiza la entrega de sus productos según el pedido en su domicilio, es cliente antigua con buena referencias, vive en la zona de villa obrajes, es una persona muy amable y trabajadora, se levanta desde muy tempranas horas de la mañana para comprar sus productos por mayor y el dinero del crédito lo utilizar en la compra de afrecho al por mayor, se siente agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Alicia is married and she has two children. She is a merchant who sells bran by the quintal. Generally she has clients from farms that purchase this feed for their poultry and pigs. She has many clients and she also delivers the products placed on order to the locations. She is a long time client and she has good references. She lives in the region of Villa Obrajes. She is a very kind and hardworking person who starts her days very early in the morning to make her wholesale purchases. She will use the funds from the loan to purchase bran in wholesale. She is thankful to the institution for the support provided.

loans.use: to purchase bran in wholesale.

loans.name: Juaquina

texts.es: Juaquina tiene 39 años, es natural del pueblo de Santa fe, ahí vive en su casa propia en compañía de su esposo Máximo de 50 años y de sus 03 hijos, quienes son el motivo de su esfuerzo. Juaquina, es una mujer muy trabajadora, tiene una pequeña bodega donde vende arroz azúcar, galletas, detergentes, entre otros. Es así que desde muy temprano se levanta para poder atender a sus clientes, asimismo agrega que empezó hace 02 años con este negocio, y asegura que le va bien con las ventas que realiza. Se siente muy contenta con su trabajo, por que gracias a ello sustenta los gastos de educación de sus queridos hijos. Con el tiempo desea comprar un terreno por su localidad y así como comprar más víveres para implementar su bodega. Este será su séptimo crédito con MFP, y se compromete seguir aportando sus cuotas puntualmente con los anteriores créditos. Agradece a los socios de su banco comunal por elegirle como presidente de la junta directiva. Con el préstamo solicitado de 2,000 nuevos comprará un terreno en su localidad e incrementar más productos para implementar su negocio como: sacos de arroz, azúcar, productos enlatados.
texts.en: Juaquina is 39 years old and she is originally from the village of Santa Fe. She lives there in her own home together with her husband, Maximo, who is 50 years old, and their 3 children. They are the reason for her efforts. Juaquina is a very hardworking woman and she has a small grocery store from where she sells rice, sugar, cookies, detergents, and other products. She starts her days very early in the morning to be able to attend to her clients. She adds that she has been in business for 2 years and she assures us that her sales are doing very well. She is very happy with her work, especially because this is how she is able to cover the educational fees of her beloved children. In time she wants to purchase a plot of land in her community and to purchase more products to supply her store. This will be her seventh loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner) and she is committed to keep making her payments on time as she has with the previous loans. She is thankful to the members of her communal bank for electing her as the president of the board of directors. With the loan she requests, amounting to 2000 nuevos soles, she will purchase a plot of land in hr community and she will buy more products to supply her business, including: sacks of rice, sugar, and canned goods.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of rice, sugar, and canned goods.

loans.name: Luis Sirilio

texts.es:
Luis,  vive en una zona suburbana llamada “Duran”, un hombre responsable en  su negocio.
Su negocio es una tienda, que está ubicada en la parte delantera de su vivienda.

Esta actividad la realiza con su esposa, su horario es de lunes a domingo, desde las 7:00am hasta las 22:00pm.
Su dificultad es la competencia, ya que por el sector donde vive hay  varios negocios con su misma actividad.

El solicita el préstamo para la compra de mercadería como: arroz, aceites, bebidas, atún, etc. Su sueño es terminar su vivienda al 100% y que su negocio incremente.
texts.en:
Luis lives in the suburban region called "Duran". He is a responsible person in his business. He has a store which is located in the front part of his house.

He carries out this activity together with his wife. His schedule is from Monday to Sunday, from 7:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m.

His challenge is the competition. In the sector where he lives there are many other business like his.

He requests a loan to purchase merchandise such as: rice, cooking oil, drinks, tuna, etc. His dream is to finish building his house 100% and to make his business increase.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise such as rice, cooking oil, drinks, and tuna, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase rice, beans, coffee, oil, condiments, bread and eggs.

loans.name: Juan Pablo Ii Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “JUAN PABLO II” iniciará su quinto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Collpani, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Virginia. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de perfumes, venta de neumáticos, venta de pescado, venta de medicina tradicional, venta de cremallera de auto, venta de sopas, tienda de barrio, venta de cosméticos.
 
La señora Virginia,  indica que hace dos años que integra Pro Mujer  y que ingreso por invitación de la asesora de crédito. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de pescado que viene trabajando hace quince años, aprendiendo el mismo de su mamá. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar capital (compra de pescados) que adquirirá en El Alto  y posteriormente lo venderá en las ferias. Esta forma de trabajo le permitirá generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella es casada y tiene ocho hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el ahorro, salud y capacitación.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Juan Pablo II" will start their fifth loan cycle with Pro Mujer (Kiva Field Partner) as part of Centro Collpani. It is formed by eight members and it is directed by a board of directors, which is led by Virginia. The businesses held by the members of the communal bank are diverse and among them are: perfumes sales, tire sales, fish sales, traditional medicine sales, car polish sales, soup sales, community store, and cosmetics sales.

Virginia indicates that it has been two years since she joined Pro Mujer. She joined following an invitation from a credit adviser. Currently she has a fish selling business and she has had the business for fifteen years. She learned the business from her mother.

The loan which she will take is to increase her capital, to purchase fish. She will acquire her products from El Alto and she will resell at the fairs. This form of work will help her generate an income to support her family in whatever possible. She is married and she has eight children.

When she was asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she replied that she likes the savings, health care, and orientation sessions.

loans.use: to purchase fish.

loans.name: Irma Irene

texts.es: La socia Irma está solicitando otro préstamo para uso personal específicamente para la alimentación de sus hijos y educación. El anterior crédito a la socia Irma le ayudo en el pequeño negocio de ventas de productos de belleza y obtuvo buenas ganancias de la cuales lo invirtió en el gasto familiar. La socia Irma está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos.
texts.en: Irma requests another loan for personal use, specifically for the nutrition and educational expenses of her children. The previous loan helped Irma with her small business selling beauty products. She obtained good profits which were invested in the family's expenses. Irma is happy for the loan and she is committed to making her loan payments.

loans.use: to buy school supplies for her children.

loans.name: Yanira Modesta

texts.es:
Yanira, vive con su familia, su esposo y dos hijos, ella se dedica a la venta D. productos D. belleza, D. las revistas ebel, esika, Avon, el negocio es ofrecer a sus clientes los productos D. estas revistas y ganar comisión por las ventas, tiene tres años D. estar manejando este comercio y ha logrado ganar clientes.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra D. productos D. belleza, es un pedido que ha realizado para los clientes, en el cual vienen lociones, labiales, cremas, maquillajes, y más que son necesarios para mejorar su inventario y poder realizar las ventas.
El objetivo D. Yanira es mantener el negocio, poder a través D. préstamos crecer, aumentando su clientela y mejorando los ingresos al hogar.
texts.en:
Yanira lives with her family, her husband and two children.  She works selling beauty products from the Ebel, Esika, and Avon catalogs.  The business is offering her customers products from these magazines and earning commission on the sales.  She has been running the business for three years and has managed to gain customers.

Currently she is requesting a loan to buy beauty products.  It's an order that she has maD. for her customers that includes lotions, lipstick, creams, make up, and more products that are necessary to improve her inventory to be able to make the sales.

Yanira's goal is to support her business and to be able to grow through loans, increasing her clientele and improving the earnings for her household.

loans.use: to buy an order of cosmetics: lotions, lipstick, creams, and make up.

loans.name: Amigas Group

texts.es:
Amigas es un grupo solidario compuesto por 7 mujeres muy inteligentes, trabajadoras, y que se esfuerzan por salir adelante y ayudar a sus familias. Ellas escogieron ese nombre para su grupo porque todas son muy amigas y siempre se han llevado muy bien. Sus reuniones estan ubicadas en el municipio General Escobedo, N.L.

Ma Concepción es una mujer muy responsable, tiene 53 años de edad, esta casada y tiene 3 hijos, de 28, 26 ,23 años de edad, 2 de ellos estan casados y uno esta soltero y trabaja. Actualmente, habíta en la ciudad General Escobedo, N.L., y se dedíca con mucho empeño a la venta de calzado y ropa desde hace aproximádamente 2 años; debído a las necesidad económica por la que estaba pasando comenzó a invertir en mercancía para así comenzar a ayudar a su marido con los gastos en el hogar. Ella como integrante del grupo conoce a todas sus compañeras y sabe que son personas muy confiables y honestas.

Para Ma Concepción uno de los mayores sueños que desea cumplir es seguir vendiendo calzado y ropa para salir adelante y superarse y así en un futuro con mucho esfuerzo hacerse de un puesto de comidas en el mercado y tener mas clientela.
texts.en:
Amigas is a group that is formed by 7 very intelligent, hardworking women who struggle to move forward and to help their families. They chose this name for the group because they are all close friends and they have always gotten along very well. Their meetings are held in a municipality called General Escobedo, N.L.

Maria Concepcion is a very responsible woman. She is 53 years old, married, and she has 3 children. They are aged 28, 26, and 23 years old, and two of them are married. One of single and he works. She currently lives in the city of General Escobedo, N.L. and she has dedicated herself with a great deal of diligence in selling shoes and clothing for the past two years. Given the financial need that she was facing she started to invest in the purchase of merchandise to help her husband with the household expenses. As a member of the group she knows each of her colleagues and she knows they are very trustworthy and honest people.

For Maria Concepcion on of her greatest dreams that she wants to accomplish is to keep selling shoes and clothing to move forward and to improve herself. In the future and through a great deal of effort she plans on setting up a food stall in the market to have more clients.

loans.use: to purchase shoes and clothing inventory.

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es:
María, se decidió por un nuevo proceso D. préstamo por la necesidad D. comprar ingredientes para la pupuseria, comprando quesillo, chicharrón, refrescos, gaseosas, condimentos, aceite. El nuevo préstamo al igual que el anterior le ayuda para mantener en su negocio todos los insumos necesarios y poder mejorar la atención y el servicio.
Hasta el momento María considera que la situacion economica en su familia a mejorado, que a traves del aumento en las ventas su condicion es otra mucho mejor.
texts.en:
María decided on a new loan because she needs to buy ingredients for her “pupusa” business.  (Pupusas are a traditional Salvadoran dish maD. from a thick corn tortilla stuffed with cheese, meat, or vegetables.)  She will buy cheese, pork rinds, carbonated drinks, condiments, and oil.

The new loan, like the previous one, helps to keep on hand all of the needed ingredients for her business.  It also helps her to be able to improve her attention and service.

María feels that her family’s financial situation has improved so far.  Through the increase in sales her condition is much better.

loans.use: to buy cheese, pork rinds, carbonated drinks, condiments, and oil.

loans.name: Mujeres Vencedoras Group

texts.es:
El comité fue formado gracias a la intervención D. una miembro D. otro comité, el cual les comento a las integrantes sobre el programa D. mujeres emprendedoras. El comité se denomina “Mujeres Vencedoras”, están en el Segundo Ciclo con 13 integrantes. Es un grupo conformado por personas muy unidas, solidarias y responsables, las integrantes poseen un gran espíritu emprendedor, por lo que se comprometen en cumplir con cabalidad con los compromisos.
