Sus sueños a nivel personal son terminar sus estudios de derecho.
María se encuentra muy contenta y agradecida del crédito otorgado por Fondo esperanza, ya que éste le permitirá invertir en su negocio y generar mayores ganancias. Además comenta que existe una muy buena relación con el grupo del Banco comunal, han generado confianza y buen fiato.  
Independencia es una de las 34 comunas que componen la ciudad de Santiago (capital de Chile), ubicada en el sector centro-norte. Surgió a fines del siglo XIX como un sector tradicional de la ciudad. Su eje principal es la Av. Independencia, por la cual pasaba el antiguo Camino del Inca, puerta de entrada por el norte, a la ciudad de Santiago. Dada su amplia población indígena, en Independencia se encuentra el Centro Cultural Indígena de Chile. Cuenta también con importantes construcciones históricas, entre ellas 6 monumentos históricos de Chile.
texts.en:
This village bank is called "Mirando el Futuro" and is made up of 17 entrepreneurs who work in different fields including warehouses, making and selling food, and barber shops. All of them live in the community of Independencia in the city of Santiago.

Maria is a member of the group seen in the photo sitting on the far right in the front row, with long blond hair. She has worked as a hair stylist for 12 years. She learned the trade at an institute, and she also offers pedicures, manicures and hair removal. She works from 6pm to 10pm every day of the week in her own beauty salon. She tells us that she works this schedule because she is also studying law at the university. 

Her business has a lot of customers, many of whom have been with her since she started in the field. She buys her materials through a specialized beauty salon product distributor, and she also gets discounts for being a frequent customer. 

With the loan she will buy materials for her salon including bleach water, peroxide creams, straightening creams and a razor. Her goal for her business is to install an integrated beauty center because she also wants to incorporate massage services. 

Maria lives with her two children, 22 and 17, both of whom study - the elder in university and the younger in high school. Her personal dream is to finish her law studies. 

Maria is very happy and grateful for the loan given to her by the Fondo Esperanza because it will allow her to invest in her business and generate more income. She also tells us that she has a very good relationship with the village bank, that they trust each other. Independencia is one of 34 communities that make up the city of Santiago (capital of Chile), located in the north-central sector. At the end of the 19th century it arose as a traditional sector of the city. The main street is Independence Avenue, which passes by the old Inca Trail, the entryway from the north to the city of Santiago. Due to the large indigenous population, Independencia is the Indigenous Cultural Center of Chile. It also has important old buildings, including 6 historical Chilean monuments.

loans.use: to buy materials for her beauty salon including bleach water, peroxide creams, straightening creams and a razor.

loans.name: Flor

texts.es: Flor, de 37 años, es una señora muy amable, responsable y trabajadora, es conviviente con su pareja con quien tiene un hijo de 7 años, ella vive en casa de su cuñado a lado de su hijo, su pareja y la familia de su cuñado. Trabaja mucho para poder salir adelante y dar lo mejor a su familia. El trabajo de Flor consiste en la venta de comida, ella desde temprano esta muy activa ya que sale a hacer sus compras al mercado y busca lo mejor, para así poder brindar buenos alimentos a sus fieles clientes quienes la buscan siempre por su buena sazón y su trato amable. Luego se dirige al malecón del reloj publico, ahí tiene un puesto y desde ahí vende sus deliciosos alimentos, lleva haciendo este trabajo por veinte años y recibe la ayuda de su madre con quien comparten las responsabilidades del negocio. Le gusta mucho cocinar, creció haciendo esto a lado de su madre y le gusta estar junto a ella, además le da tiempo por las tardes para poder realizar otras actividades. Sus clientes son fieles y siempre la buscan porque reciben buen trato y además es deliciosos los platillos que prepara Flor. Le esta yendo bien y espera poder ampliar su negocio poniendo un puesto estable sin ir muy lejos para así pode conservar sus clientes. Este será su segundo crédito con MFP, se siente contenta de trabajar con su grupo ya que son personas muy responsables, espera seguir así y seguir mostrándose responsable como lo hizo hasta ahora. Agradece mucho a la institución pues le es de mucha ayuda los prestamos recibidos. Con el monto solicitado, comprará materiales para seguir con su negocio, pues ella necesita nuevas ollas, más cubiertos y algunas refacciones para su puesto, vende cada plato de comida a 3 soles aproximadamente.
texts.en: Flor, 37 years old, is a very kind, responsible, and hardworking woman. She lives with her partner with whom she has a 7-year old child. She lives in her brother-in-law's home with his family, her son, and her partner. She works a great deal to get ahead and give her family the best. Flor's job consists of selling food. From a young age, she has been active, going to the market and looking for the best of everything in order to be able to provide good food to her loyal customers who always seek her out due to her good cooking and kind service. Afterwards she goes to the street with the clock tower where she has a stall and sells her delicious food. She has been doing this job for twenty years and receives assistance from her mother with whom she shares the responsibilities of the business. She likes to cook a lot; she grew up doing this next to her mom and she enjoy being together with her. Moreover, it gives her time in the afternoon to do other activities. Her customers are loyal and always seek her out because they receive good service and also because Flor's dishes are delicious. She's doing well and hopes her business is able to grow, having a more stable stall without going very far, and in this way be able to keep her customers. This will be her second loan with MFP. She is happy to work with her group as they are very responsible people and she hopes to continue like this and continue showing her responsibility as she's done until now. She greatly thanks the institution as the received loans help a lot. With the amount requested, she will buy materials to continue her business. As such, she needs new pots, more silverware, and to refurbish some parts of her stall. She sells each plate of food for approximately 3 soles.

loans.use: to buy pots, silverware, and to refurbish the area of her food stall.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fresh fish, squid, oysters, and shrimp.

loans.name: Karina Lizzette

texts.es:
Karina, está nuevamente solicitando el préstamo para aumentar el negocio, comprando joyas de oro, pantalones, camisas y lencería, esta nueva inversión espera que le ayude para mejorar la disponibilidad en el negocio.
Karina ha realizado las inversiones con el prestamo anterior y piensa que su condición ha mejorado por la ayuda de los préstamos, tanto sus ventas como los ingresos para el hogar ha sido mejor.
texts.en:
Karina is requesting a new loan so that she can increase her business. She will buy gold jewelry, trousers, shirts, and lingerie. This new investment is expected to improve the availability of products in her business.

Karina has made investments with her previous loan and believes her condition has improved as a result. Both her sales and her income have gotten better.

loans.use: to buy gold jewelry, trousers, shirts, and lingerie.

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.es: La Sra. Lourdes tiene  3 hijos  que se encuentran estudiando es divorciada, cuenta la señora que la separación fue difícil para ella pero pudo salir adelante por el bienestar de su hijos, ella sola mantiene a su hijos y corre con todos los gastos de hogar, ella se dedica  a la venta de ropa pero también es maestra  medio día,  y la venta de ropa la realiza todos los días, el préstamo lo invertirá para la compra de mercadería  por cambio de temporada, la Sra.  Lourdes trabaja mucho por el bienestar de sus hijos su deseo es el poder verlos profesionales y personas de bien, se encuentra agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Lourdes has three children that are currently in school and she is divorced. She says that the separation was difficult for her but that she was able to move forward for the good of her children. She alone provides for her children and pays for all the household expenses. She makes a living selling clothing every day but also is a teacher half of the day. She will use the loan to buy merchandise for the change in the season. Lourdes works a great deal for the good of her children and her hope is to be able to see them become professionals and good people. She is thankful for the institution and for the support they have given.

loans.use: to buy seasonal clothing in bulk.

loans.name: Rosalama

texts.en:
Rosalama, 24 years of age, is married and has no children. She has owned and operated a business selling food products in the local community for 1 year. Rosalama needs a loan of WST 1,000 to purchase additional products to sell. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 400 WST or US $167 per week) to improve/expand the business.

In 2011, Rosalama joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral. This is Rosalama's 1st loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell

loans.name: Jesus Amada

texts.es:
Jesús es una madre de familia, tiene 51 años de edad, reside junto a sus 2 hijos en su casa propia, la cual cuenta con servicio sólo de luz en el distrito de Las Lomas, una zona agrícola y ganadera que pertenece al departamento de Piura.

Se dedica a trabajar vendiendo cosméticos por catálogo, ella vende estos productos entre sus vecinos y amistades, diariamente se esfuerza por captar más clientes ya que mientras más pedidos realice a la empresa que le provee de productos le otorga mayores ingresos. El negocio le ayuda a solventar sus gastos y necesidades diarias de su casa.  También cría y vende aves de corral, una vez que llegan a su desarrollo óptimo los comercializa en el mercado de la zona y así tiene otro ingreso para  su casa.

Jesús desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de más productos de belleza y de alimentobalanceadopara sus animales, así sus clientes tendrán productos al alcance de la mano y no tendrán que esperar a fin de mes que es cuando llega el pedido, para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Jesús, 51, is a mother of 2 children and lives in her own house, one that only has electricity, no running water.  They live in Las Lomas district, an agricultural and cattle-raising area in Piura department.

She sells cosmetics through a catalog to her neighbors and friends.  She makes daily efforts to attract more customers since the more orders she has for the company, the more products they give her and the higher the earnings.  The business helps her cover expenses and everyday needs of her house.  She also raises and sells poultry once they have reached their best size.  She sells them in the market and thus has another household income.

Jesús wants to increase her business by buying more beauty supplies and balanced food for her animals.  Having more products will give her customers access to the cosmetics and they won’t have to wait until the end of the month when the merchandise ordered arrives.  For this she has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa of 1500 new sols.

loans.use: to increase her inventory and better meet her customers' needs

loans.name: Lafoai

texts.en:
Lafoai is 55 years of age and married with five children. She has owned and operated a business selling soft drinks in the local community for 4 years. Lafoai needs a loan of WST $2500 to to purchase a refrigerator for storage of drinks. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 500 WST or US $208 per week) to improve/expand the business.

In 2009, Lafoai joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral. This is Lafoai's 5th loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase a refrigerator for storage of drinks

loans.name: Jesus Margarita

texts.es:
Margarita de 45 años, una mujer trabajadora que tiene aspiraciones de crecimiento. Su negocio de venta de comida lo inicio aproximadamente 10 años, este negocio está situado en un local del mercado.

Inicio este negocio porque se dio cuenta que tenía el arte de cocina en las manos. Su actividad la realiza sola, su horario de trabajo empieza de las 6:00am hasta 1:00pm.

Está casada, su esposo trabaja en el mercado vendiendo productos naturales. Solicita el préstamo para la compra de mercadería como: arroz, aceites, bebidas, azúcar, etc. Su sueño es tener un restaurante propio.
texts.en:
Margarita is 45 years old and a hardworking woman with aspirations for growth. She started her food sales business approximately 10 years ago and it is located in a local market.

She began this business because she realized that she had the art of cooking within her grasp. She does this by herself and her work schedule goes from 6:00am until 1:00pm.

She's married and her husband works in the market selling natural products. She is requesting the loan to buy merchandise like: rice, oil, drinks, sugar, etc. Her dream is to have her own restaurant.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like: rice, oil, drinks, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Maria De La Paz

texts.es:
María, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo para seguir incrementando el negocio, y al mismo tiempo tener el apoyo de la institución, por el momento comprara tomates, repollos, aguacates, pepinos, esta inversión espera que le ayude como la anterior, ya que también le ha ayudado a mantenerse en el comercio.
Las inversiones de Maria le han ocasionado un incremento en las ventas, ya que al disponer de más mercaderia los clientes encontraban en ella lo necesario en verduras.
texts.en: María has decided on a new loan to continue expanding her business and to continue having support from the institution.  For the present, she will buy tomatoes, cabbage, avocadoes and cucumbers.  She hopes this purchase will help her like the previous one since it also helped her stay in business.  María’s investments have led to increased sales since having merchandise in stock makes it possible for her customers to find all the vegetables they need with her.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, cabbage, avocadoes and cucumbers.

loans.name: Libardo De Jesús

texts.es:
A sus 50 años de edad Libardo es un trabajador incansable que desde hace de 10 años se dedica la carpintería, específicamente a la fabricación muebles, sus clientes lo reconocen por su buen servicio y la calidad en el producto terminado.

Actualmente necesita comprar materia prima para la fabricación pero no cuenta con el capital necesario para realizar esta compra por lo que solicita un préstamo con el cual comprará los insumos necesarios para seguir `prestando un servicio eficaz y de muy buena calidad. Sueña con tener una ebanistería reconocida en el sector, incrementar sus ventas y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
At 50 years of age, Libardo is a tireless worker. He has been a carpenter since the age of 10, specializing in furniture making. His clients recognize him for his good service and the quality of his finished product. 

He currently needs to purchase raw material but does not have the necessary capital to make the investment. He is requesting a loan to purchase the necessary materials to make furniture to carry on offering efficient, high quality service. His dreams are to have a his furniture carpentry shop well known in the area, to increase his sales, and to improve his quality of life

loans.use: purchase raw material to make furniture

loans.name: Genaro

texts.es: El señor Genaro vive en la zona de Lagunas  de la ciudad de el Alto,  con su esposa y sus tres hijos pequeños de los cuales el mayor ya esta en la escuela, el señor  es sastre desde hace varios años se dedica  a la  confección de  uniformes para policías, con los cuales el tiene contratos para la entrega de uniformes, vive en casa propia donde esta su taller   el necesita capital para invertirlo en la compra de telas por rollo su mayor sueño es tener una microempresa y poder contrata mano de obra para dar oportunidad a otros jóvenes de aprender un oficio y también el de ver algún día  profesionales a sus hijos  y brindarles comodidad, es un apersona emprendedora con muchas ganas de superación y de mejorar su calidad de vida de el y de toda su familia.
texts.en: Mr. Genaro lives in the area of Lagunas in the city of El Alto with his wife and three small children, the eldest of which is in school.  Genaro is a tailor and has been making police uniforms for several years under contract.  He lives in his own house where he has his workshop.  He is in need of capital to buy rolls of fabric.  His goal is to have a microenterprise and be able to hire young people and give them the opportunity to learn a skill.  He also wants his children to be professionals one day so they will have a better lifestyle.  He is an enterprising person with a great desire to get ahead and improve his and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: To buy rolls of fabric.

loans.name: Jose Andres

texts.es:
Jose de 23 años, un hombre muy trabajador que tiene aspiraciones de mejorar su vida cotidiana.
Su profesión es Bombero, inicio esta actividad como voluntario, luego al transcurrir un tiempo se le dio un contrato.

Escogió esta actividad porque le gusta ayudar a la gente. Su trabajo lo realiza solo y en equipo, trabaja 48 horas y descansa 24 de todos los días de las semanas. Su dificultad son los riesgos al acudir a un incendio, hay veces que se ahoga con el humo de las llamas ya que en ocasiones hay incendio de gran magnitud de llamas.
El solicita el préstamo para el mejoramiento de vivienda ya que quiere darle una mejor vida a su familia. 

Su sueño es tener su casa construida, el anhelo de él es estar casado y obtener un hijo.
texts.en:
Jose is 23 and a very hard worker who aspires to a better lifestyle.  He is a fireman by profession.  He started out as a volunteer but then was given a contract after some time.

He chose this line of work becaue he likes people.  He works either alone or in a team during a 48-hour period, followed by a 24-hour rest, all week long.  The risks of the fire can be difficult for him since he sometimes feels like he's suffocating from the smoke and occasionally the fires have enormous flames.

He is requesting a loan to carry out home improvements so he can give his family a better life.

His dream is to see his house finished so he get married and have a child.

loans.use: To buy cement, sand and blocks for home improvement.

loans.name: Rigoberto

texts.es:
Rigoberto de 38 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio sólo de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande, la cual pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesana.

Rigoberto desde hace algunos años se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral (ovino, porcino y aves de corral, sus corrales se encuentra en la parte externa de su casa, los cuales son apropiados, los alimenta con comida balanceada,  pastos y granos naturales para que sus animales lleguen a tener un crecimiento óptimo para qué pueda ofrecerlos en los diferentes mercados de la zona y así obtenga muy buenas ganancias para solventar sus gastos diarios de su hogar.  

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para compra de más alimento balanceado y sanidad de sus animales, con los ingresos que obtenga puede cubrir su crédito y mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hijos.  Rigoberto es una persona trabajadora y muy responsable que lo único que quiere es que sus hijos se superen y  tener mejoras económicas que ofrecerles.
texts.en:
Rigoberto, 38, lives with is wife and children in his own house which has electricity as the sole utility.  It is located in the rural district of Tambogrande which belongs to the department of Piura.  This area is known for its agriculture, livestock farming and handicrafts.

For several years Rigoberto has been raising and selling livestock such as sheep, pigs and chickens.  He has set up an appropriate barnyard behind his house and gives the animals balanced feed, fodder and natural grains so they will develop to optimum size for sale at the different markets in the area.  In this way he earns a good profit to take care of household expenses.

He has requested a loan in the amount of 1,000 PEN through Edpyme Alternativa to buy more balanced feed and pay for animal healthcare.  With the income he earns he will pay back the loan and improve his children's lifestyle.  Rigoberto is a hard-working, responsible person who wants the best for his children and to be able to offer them economic stability.

loans.use: To buy balanced animal feed and pay for animal healthcare.

loans.name: Lotonuu

texts.en:
Lotonuu is 24 years of age and married with one child. She has owned and operated a business hauling scrap metal for local businesses and community members for 2 years. Lotonuu needs a loan of WST $1,500 to purchase additional scrap metal to sell. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 400 WST or US $167 per week) to improve/expand the business.

In 2010, Lotonuu joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral. This is Lotonuu's 2nd loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase additional scrap metal to sell

loans.name: Melina Narcisa

texts.es:
Melina de 29 años, vive en una zona llamada “Duran”.
Inicio el negocio de elaboración de bocaditos y buffet hace 5 años, comenzó preparando bocaditos para la familia y al darse cuenta que lo hacia rico, decidió ponerse un local de venta de bocaditos.
La actividad la realiza sola, desde las 6:00am hasta las 1:00pm.
La dificultad de ella es la delincuencia y la entrega de bocaditos, ya que no tiene ninguna clase de vehículo para movilizarse.
Es casada, el esposo trabaja en Ingeniero de electricista.
Solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería como: harina, horno, azúcar, huevos, carnes, etc.
Su sueño es expandir su local a otros locales en otro sector de la urbe.
texts.en:
Melina is 29 and lives in the area known as "Duran".  She began her snack business five years ago and started by preparing snacks for the family.  Upon realizing that she was doing a good job she decided to set up a snack shop.

She works alone from 6:00 a.m. to 1:00 p.m.  The difficulty she is up against is delinquency and delivery of the products, since she has no vehicle to get around.  

She is married and her husband works as an electric engineer.  The loan she is requesting is to buy goods such as flour, sugar, eggs, meat, an oven, etc.

Her dream is to expand the business by setting up other shops in the town.

loans.use: To buy goods such as flour, sugar, eggs, meat, an oven, etc.

loans.name: Katiuska

texts.es: Katiuska, de 26 años, es una señora muy joven y soñadora, ella es madre de un niño de siete meses quien es fruto de su matrimonio. Ella vive junto a su hijo y su esposo en una casa propia que pudieron comprar con arduo trabajo juntos y desde ahí todos los días trabajan para tener una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Katiuska consiste en la venta de ropa, ella trae desde la ciudad de Lima en grandes cantidades las prendas y se encarga de vender en la ciudad entre sus amigos, vecinos y familiares y si llegan clientes nuevos y son confiables, ella igual hace negocios con ellos. Realiza este trabajo sola y por mucho tiempo y lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le da tiempo para atender a su bebe que nació hace pocos meses, ya que ella esta experimentando el sentimiento maternal a lado de su pequeño hijo. Le esta yendo bien ya que tiene clientes y muy buenos, espera que pueda crecer con su trabajo y pueda poner una boutique que le permitirá estar en un solo lugar y de ahí realizar sus ventas. Este será el segundo crédito con MFP, se siente bien con el grupo que trabaja ya que todos se muestran muy comprensivos y responsables, ahora espera poder seguir trabajando juntos ya que le es de mucha ayuda los prestamos recibidos. Con el monto solicitado, comprará más mercadería al por mayor para así poder seguir brindando la mejor calidad al menor precio.
texts.en:
Katiuska, 26, is a young lady with a dream.  She lives with her seven-month-old son and husband in their own house which they bought through joint hard work.  They work every day to have a better quality of life.  Katiuska sells clothing which she brings from the city of Lima.  She sells large quantities of garments in the city among her friends, neighbors and family.  If new customers appear and can be trusted she starts business with them.  She works alone and has been in business for a long time.  What she enjoys most about her work is that it gives her time to take care of her baby and experience being a mother alongside her infant son.  

Business is going well for her because she has good customers.  She hopes to be able to expand and set up a boutique so she can sell her goods out of one place.  This will be her second loan through MFP.  She enjoys the group she works with because everyone is understanding and responsible.  Her desire is to keep working together because the loans she receives are very helpful.  With this loan she plans to buy more merchandise wholesale so she can offer good quality at low prices.

loans.use: To buy wholesale .

loans.name: Laura Vicenta

texts.es:
Laura de 40 años, vive en una zona suburbana llamada “Durán”.
La actividad de ella es la venta de helados, tiene un local en la parte delantera de su vivienda.
Ella escogió esta actividad porque lo heredo de su padre, ya que también tenía una heladería.
La dificultad de ella es que le sale muy alta las planillas de luz y a veces no tiene como cancelar esa cuota.
Está casada, el esposo trabaja en el municipio, tienen tres hijos uno de 7, 8y 10 años. Los tres estudian en escuelas públicas.
Ella solicita el préstamo para el incremento de su negocio, y para la compra de productos como: conos, servilletas, chocolate, etc.
Su sueño es incrementar su negocio y que sus hijos puedan terminar su carrera escolares.
texts.en: Laura is 40 years old. She lives in a suburban area called “Durán”. Her activity is selling ice cream. She has a locale in the front of her house. She chose this activity because she inherited it from her father, since he also has an ice cream store. Her problem is that her electricity bills are very high and sometimes she can't pay that bill. She is married and her husband works at city call. They have three children, aged 7, 8 and 10. The three of them go to public schools. She is asking for the loan to grow her business and to buy products such as: cones, napkins, chocolate, etc. Her dream is to grow her business and for her children to finish their studies.

loans.use: to buy products such as cones, napkins, chocolate, etc.

loans.name: Lea

texts.en:
Lea is 45 years of age and married with five children. Lea owns & operates a business venture, driving a taxi.  She has 3 years of experience in this business. Lea needs a loan of WST $1000 to purchase car parts and paints to re-paint the taxi.  She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 500 talas or US $208 per week) to improve/expand the business.

In 2010, Lea joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.  Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral.  This is Lea's 2nd loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase car parts and paints to re-paint the taxi

loans.name: Jill

texts.en:
Jill is 38 years of age and married with four children. Jill owns & operates a business venture, selling baked goods in the local community.  She has 2 years of experience in this business. Jill needs a loan of WST $1000 to purchase baking powder, sacks of flour, sacks of sugar, yeast and an oven.  She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 400 talas or US $167 per week) to improve/expand the business.

In 2010, Jill joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.  Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral.  This is Jill's 2nd loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase baking powder, sacks of flour, sacks of sugar, yeast and an oven

loans.name: Olga Yojany

texts.es:
Olga es una madre de familia de 33 años, vive en su casa propia con sus hijos, cuenta con el  servicio sólo de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Las Lomas que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Zona de actividad agrícola y ganadera.

Desde hace algunos años Olga se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza y crianza de aves de corral, ambas actividades lo tiene en su domicilio, sus productos los ofrece a sus clientes tantode casa en casa como en su domicilio y sus aves las comercializa una vez que hayan llegadoasu tamaño y peso ideal, con los ingresos que obtenga en ambas actividades podrá brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar más productos de belleza  como alimento balanceado para sus aves de corral y así podrá obtener mayores ganancias para tener una mejor calidad de vida.  Olga es una mujer trabajadora y una madre que siempre trata que su familia salga adelante a pesar de las dificultades que a veces se presentan en la vida.
texts.en:
Olga is a 33-year-old mother.  She lives in her own home with her children, with lights as their only utility, in the rural area of the Las Lomas district belonging to the department of Piura.  The area’s main activities are agriculture and livestock.

For a few years now, Olga has sold beauty products and raised poultry, both of which she does from home.  She offers her products to her customers both by going from house to house and from her home, and she sells her birds once they have reached the ideal size and weight.  With the earnings from both jobs, she can offer her children a better quality of life.

She has requested a loan of 2000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy more beauty products and nutritious feed for her birds so that she will be able to earn more and have a better quality of life.  Olga is a hard working woman and a mother who always tries to help her family move forward in spite of the difficulties that sometimes come up in life.

loans.use: buy beauty products and nutritious feed for her poultry.

loans.name: Maua

texts.en:
Maua is 35 years of age and married with five children. Maua owns & operates a business venture, driving a taxi.  She has 2 years of experience in this business. Maua needs a loan of WST $1000 to renew vehicle license.  She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 350 talas or US $167 per week) to improve/expand the business.

In 2010, Maua joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.  Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral.  This is Maua's 2nd loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to renew vehicle license

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es:
José, nuevamente está solicitando un préstamo, ya que no tiene fondos suficientes para la compra de productos para el negocio, comprara azúcar, aceite, harina,huevos, con la inversión espera fortalecer nuevamente el negocio y continuar trabajando.
Con la solicitud anterior invirtio en la construccion, lo cual fue un gran avance para el desarrollo de la panaderia, dando un mejor servicio a los clientes y mejorando la condición familia.
texts.en: José is once again requesting a loan because he lacks sufficient funds to buy products for the bakery.  He will buy sugar, oil, flour and eggs.  He hopes to use the loan to once again strengthen the business and continue working.  He used the previous loan for construction which was a great step forward for his bakery’s development providing better customer service and improving his family’s condition.

loans.use: to buy sugar, oil, flour and eggs.

loans.name: Ernestina

texts.en:
Ernestina is 24 years of age and married with one child. Ernestina owns & operates a business venture, selling daily use products such as shampoo, soap & toothpaste in the local community.  She has 1 year of experience in this business. Ernestina needs a loan of WST $1000 to purchase additional products to sell.  She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 400 talas or US $167 per week) to improve/expand the business.

In 2011, Ernestina joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.  Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral.  This is Ernestina's 1st loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell

loans.name: Manua

texts.en:
Manua is 27 years of age and married with one child. Manua owns & operates a business venture, driving a taxi.  She has 2 years of experience in this business.  Manua needs a loan of WST $1500 to renew vehicle license.  She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 450 talas or US $188 per week) to improve/expand the business.

In 2010, Manua joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.  Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral.  This is Manua's 2nd loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to renew vehicle license

loans.name: Jose Tomas

texts.es:
José, por necesidad en su negocio, está nuevamente solicitando un préstamo, para la compra de cubre camas, colchas, almohadas, para continuar vendiendo, él préstamo anterior le ayudo grandemente para crecer en el negocio, esto lo motivo a continuar fortaleciendo y crecer cada día más en su mercadería.
Estos préstamos son el apoyo para que microempresarios continúen en su labor, tratando de hacer su vida y contribuir con su familia.
texts.en: José is once again requesting a loan because his business needs it.  He will buy comforters, bedspreads and pillows to continue selling.  The previous loan helped him quite a bit to grow in business and this motivated him to continue strengthening it and to grow daily with his merchandise.  These loans are the support that makes it possible for micro businessmen to stay in business trying to make a life for themselves and contribute to their families.

loans.use: to buy comforters, bedspreads and pillows.

loans.name: Lina Patricia

texts.es:
Lina es una mujer emprendedora que ha trabajado incansablemente por sacar a sus 2 hijos adelante, actualmente tiene una tienda en su casa donde ofrece productos de gran variedad y adicional a este vende comida rápida, sueña con tener una gran miscelánea donde la variedad y la calidad de sus productos la diferencien de la competencia.

Lina debe surtir su negocio, comprar productos al por mayor e insumos para la preparación de la comida rápida pero no cuenta con capital para invertirle a su negocio por lo que solicita un crédito con el que comprará lo necesario para incrementar las ventas, generar mas ingresos para los gastos del hogar y proporcionalmente mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Lina is an enterprising woman who has worked tirelessly to get her 2 children ahead. At present, she has a store in her house where she offers a wide variety of products. In addition, she also sells fast food. She dreams of having a great variety store where the variety and quality of her products would distinguish her from the competition. 

Lina has to stock her store, buying products wholesale and ingredients to prepare the fast food. She doesn't have the capital to invest in her business and that is why she is asking for a loan to buy what she needs to increase her sales, generate more income for household expenses, and proportionally improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her business and ingredients to prepare fast food.

loans.name: Indira

texts.es: La señorita Indira tiene una movilidad  que lo hace trabajar como taxi  ella administra la movilidad ya que tiene un chofer que la maneja y  la renta le entrega a diario,  su coche esta en buen estado pero la señorita quiere hacer cambiar a  de gasolina a GNV gas, la señorita es egresada de la carrera de odontología actualmente es ayudante de un consultorio odontológico,  ella esta en los tramites para su titulación, ella actualmente es soltera pero tiene su novio ellos quieren formar una familia en un futuro, el crédito será invertido en la refacción de su movilidad y cambio de gasolina a GNV, y a si de esta manera reducir gastos en lo que implica la compra de gasolina, es una persona joven emprendedora con ganas de superación y se encuentra agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Señorita Indira has a vehicle which she uses as a taxi. She organizes the running of the vehicle and she has a driver who operates it and pays her a daily rent. Her car is in good condition but the Señorita would like to change from gasoline to NGV. She is a dentistry graduate and is currently working as an assistant in a dental surgery. She is in the process of becoming qualified. At the moment she is unmarried but she has a boyfriend and they want to start a family in the future. 

The loan will be invested in the renovation of her vehicle and the change from gasoline to NGV. This will help to reduce the bills associated with the purchase of gasoline. She is an enterprising young woman with a  desire to succeed and she is grateful to the institution for their support.

loans.use: to convert from gasline to NGV and to renovate her vehicle.

loans.name: Andrea Lisbett

texts.es: Andrea tiene como proyecto mejorar la infraestructura de su vivienda a corto plazo. Con el préstamo anterior logro ampliar la variedad de productos para ofrecer, mejorando las ventas. Esta solicitando este préstamo para comprar herramientas necesarias como: termos grandes, el toldo que necesita para cubrir a sus clientes de la lluvia y el sol, también mesas con sus respectivas sillas, y materia prima. Con estas inversiones lograra captar más clientela al ofrecerle mejor servicio y mayor atención. Sin faltar las ganancias que obtendrá al aumentar sus ventas. Agradece la financiera por el apoyo al desarrollo de su negocio y mejora su nivel de vida.
texts.en: Andrea’s short-term project is to make improvements to her dwelling.  She used the previous loan to expand the variety of products she sells thereby improving sales.  She’s asking for this loan to buy necessary tools like large thermos bottles, a tarp to protect her customers from rain and sun and also tables with their respective chairs and also raw materials.  With these investments she’ll be able to gain more customers by offering better service and attention as well as profits from increased sales.  She thanks the lending institution for supporting her business’ development and improving her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy tarps and other necessary tools to provide better customer srvice.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clay, nacazcol and firewood.

loans.name: Karina Elizabeth

texts.es:
Karina de 37 años, una mujer que a pesar de ser madres soltera ha sabido cómo ganarse la vida.
Ella empezó su negocio de venta de muñecas felpa después de la separación de su esposo.

Se dedico a practicar en curso la elaboración de estas muñecas, con el tiempo y la práctica se puso su negocio.
Su trabajo lo realiza sola, trabaja solo en el día, todos los días de las semanas. Su dificultad es la inseguridad de la zona en donde ella tiene su negocio.

Ella solicita el préstamo para comprar materia prima de muñeca de felpa. Su sueño es incrementar sus ventas.
texts.en:
Karina is 37 years old.  In spite of being a single mother, she has known how to earn a living.  She started her business, selling plush dolls, after she separated from her husband.

Karina took a course in making these dolls and, with time and practice, she started her business.

Karina carries out her work alone.  She works during the day, every day of the week.  Her difficulty is the lack of security in the area where she has her business.  She is requesting this loan to buy raw materials for making her plush dolls.  Her dream is to increase her sales.

loans.use: to buy supplies for making plush dolls

loans.name: Cristhian Antonio

texts.es: El sr. Cristhian es un cliente que esta en su segunda secuencia de crédito, con buena referencia crediticia, se dedica a la atención de servicio de té, mates, cafés y la venta de sándwiches de pollo, carne molida, carnes frías y huevo, en su anaquel que esta ubicado en la zona Mario Mercado,  el sr. Cristhian por lo que se ha podido ver,  es un cliente joven emprendedor, que trabaja con su familia y con el tiempo piensa expandir mas su negocio, razón por la cual este crédito lo va invertir en otra actividad, para compra de ropa y  de edredones, blusas y otros por mayor, ya que se acerca la época navideña y el venderá estos productos por temporada, por lo cual  esta poniendo empeño a sus actividades, con mucho entusiasmo en cuanto a la ampliación de sus negocios por lo cual esta solicitando  crédito.
texts.en:
Cristhian is a client who is on his second loan cycle.  He has a good credit record.  His business is serving tea, maté infusions and coffee.  He also sells ground meat, cold cuts and eggs from his stand which is located in Mario Mercado district.  Cristhian, as you can see, is a young, entrepreneurial client who works with his family and, over time, plans to further expand his business.

Cristhian will invest this loan in another business activity, buying clothes, comforters etc. wholesale.  The Christmas season is approaching and he will sell these products during this season.  He is putting a lot of effort into his activities and is very keen to expand his businesses.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan.

loans.use: to buy clothes and comforters

loans.name: Georgina

texts.es:
A sus 49 años de edad Georgina es una mujer que siempre ha luchado por generar ingresos para el hogar, como madre de 3 hijos siempre se ha preocupado por brindarles un mejor futuro, actualmente tiene una miscelánea donde vende bebidas, variedades, bolsos y otros productos que sus clientes van pidiendo, pues para ella lo mas importante es satisfacer las necesidades de compra de sus clientes, por lo que procura siempre tener surtida su miscelánea.

Sueña con ser empresaria, tener varias misceláneas y generar varios empleos pero sabe que para ello deberá trabajar con gran esmero para ver un progreso notable poco a poco, hoy en día Georgina ve la necesidad de surtir el negocio, pues se acerca una temporada alta donde las ventas aumentan y proporcionalmente las ganancias también, pero no cuenta con el capital para hacer las compras de un buen surtido, por lo que solicita un crédito que le permita mejorar las utilidades del negocio, aumentar sus ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
At 49 years of age, Georgina is a woman who has always worked hard to make income for her household.  She has three children and has always done her best to provide them with a better future.  She currently has a general store where she sells drinks, miscellaneous goods, bags and other products that her customers request.  For Georgina, the most important thing is to fulfill her customers' shopping needs.  For this reason, she always tries to keep her store stocked.

Georgina dreams of being a businesswoman with several general stores and creating several jobs.  She knows that, in order to achieve this, she must work very carefully to see a gradual, notable progress.  Right now, she needs to stock her business as a good season is approaching when her sales increase and, proportionally, her profits too.  However, she doesn't have the capital she needs to buy enough products to stock her store well.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan which will allow her to improve her business profits, increase her income and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her store

loans.name: Olfa Marlene

texts.es:
La Señora. Olfa es socia del banco comunal Mujeres Floreciendo, vive por la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que es reconocida por su belleza arquitectónica, su reserva natural, su variedad en la gastronomía típica, la cultura y tradiciones de su gente quienes son de un corazón cálido y amable.

Doña Olfa tiene 52 años, está  separada y a concebido 9 hijos, 5 son mayores de edad, casados e independientes,  tres de sus hijos solteros trabajan y le ayudan económicamente, y su ultima hija está estudiando en una escuelita de la ciudad. No tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.

La Señora. Olfa se dedica a la venta de comida y de viandas, esta actividad la realiza desde su casa, lleva 2 años con este negocio y trabaja de lunes a viernes.

Es socia del banco comunal hace 5 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de una cocina industrial y vajillas.
 
Su sueño es  comprarse un terreno para construir su casa.
texts.en:
Olfa is a member of the 'Mujeres Floreciendo' community bank and lives in the city of Cuenca.  This is a city which is well known for its architectural beauty, its nature reserve, its traditional cuisine, its culture and the traditions of its people who are warm and friendly.

Olfa is 52 years old, separated, and has nine children.  Five of her children are grown up, married, and live independently. Three of her single children work and help her out financially.  Her youngest daughter is studying at a school in the city.  She does not own her own home but rents instead.

Olfa sells food and packed lunches.  She carries out this work from her home.  She has been in this business for two years and works from Monday to Friday.

Olfa has been a member of her community bank for 5 years and she will invest her new loan in buying an industrial oven, and dishes.  Her dream is to buy a plot of land on which to build a house.

loans.use: to buy an industrial oven, and dishes

loans.name: Policarpio

texts.es:
Policarpio es un padre de familia de 47 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, la cual cuenta con servicio sólo de luz, ubicado en el distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura. Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesana.

Policarpio se dedica desde algunos años a la crianza y comercialización de aves de corral y ganado porcino (cerdos), su corral los tiene en la parte posterior de su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada y granos naturales, una vez que lleguen a su crecimiento óptimo lo puedan ofrecer a sus clientes y con los ingresos que obtenga puede solventar los gastos de su hogar.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 800 nuevos soles para comprar alimento balanceado para sus animales, una vez que se engorden los vende a los diferentes mercados de su zona, con la finalidad de que obtenga un mejor precio por ellos y así pueda tener más ingresos para tener una mejor calidad de vida para su familia.  Policarpio es una persona trabajadora y muy responsable que lo único que quiere es que su familia salga adelante.
texts.en:
Policarpio is a 47-year-old father who lives with his wife and children in his own home which only has electricity.  It is located in Tambogrande district, in Piura department.  The people in this area farm, raise livestock and make handicrafts.

Policarpio has been raising and selling poultry and pigs for some years.  His pen is located behind his home and he feeds his animals nutritionally-balanced feed and natural grains.  Once his animals have reached an optimal level of growth, he is able to sell them to his customers and use the income he makes to cover his household expenses.

Policarpio has requested a loan for 800 soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy nutritionally-balanced feed for his animals.  Once they are fattened, he will sell them in the different markets in his area.  His aim is for them to fetch a good price so that he can make more income and so that he can provide his family with a better quality of life.  Policarpio is a hard-working person and very responsible.  The only thing he wants is for his family to get ahead in life.

loans.use: to buy nutritionally-balanced feed for his animals so that he can sell them for a good price

loans.name: Susana

texts.en:
Susana is 39 years of age and married with four children. Susana owns & operates a business venture, baking & selling a variety of baked goods in the local community.  She has 2 years of experience in this business.   Susana needs a loan of WST $1500 to purchase an extra oven for her bakery.  She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 500 talas or US $208 per week) to improve/expand the business.

In 2010, Susana joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.  Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral.  This is Susana's 2nd loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase an extra oven for her bakery

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
María de 63 años, una mujer muy carismática, que tiene aspiraciones de crecimiento de negocio.
Su negocio es una tienda que está ubicada en la parte delantera de su vivienda, escogió esta actividad porque podía cuidar de su casa y como no tiene mucha preparación educativa le parecía el negocio ideal.
Su actividad la realiza con mucha responsabilidad, su horario es de lunes a domingo desde las 7:00am hasta las 20:00pm.
Es soltera y tiene 3 hijos los cuales ya son mayores de edad.
Ella solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería como: arroz, aceites, azúcar, etc.
Su sueño es terminar de construir su vivienda y que su negocio incremente.
texts.en:
Maria is 63 years old and she is a very charismatic woman who aspires with the growth of her business. Her business is a store which is located in the front section of her house. She chose this activity because she was able to continue to take care of the home and it did not have much of an educational requirement. To her it looked like an ideal business.

She carries out her activity with a great sense of responsibility. Her schedule is from Monday to Sunday from 7:00 a.m. until 8:00 p.m.

She is single and she has 3 children, all of whom are grown.

She requests a loan to purchase merchandise, such as: rice, cooking oil, sugar, etc. 

Her dream is to finish building her house and to continually increase her business.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise such as rice, cooking oil, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Ramon

texts.es: El señor Ramón es una persona  trabajadora   y  muy responsable,  el cual acudió  con nosotros ya que   nos  comenta   que  el desea  colocar   protecciones  en  su  vivienda,  ya  que  por  diversas  ocasiones  se  han tratado  de  meter  los  ladrones a  su   domicilio, agradece  el apoyo brindado para  la realización de su  proyecto  ya  que  ve  en  el crédito la posibilidad  de  brindar a  su   domicilio y a su   familia  una  mayor  seguridad.
texts.en: Ramon is a hardworking and very responsible person. He approached us because he needs to install protective structures on his house. For various reasons thieves have tried to break in to his house. He is thankful to the support towards the realization of his project. He recognizes this loan as a way to provide his house and his family with greater security.

loans.use: to install protective structures on his house.

loans.name: Juan Bautista

texts.es:
Juan, vive con su esposa y sus dos  hijos, es casado, distribuidor de pan tostado, dicho negocio surgio gracias a su  propia iniciativa y la ayuda de su esposa, no tiene horario fijo para atender a sus clientes, tiene 8 años de experiencia.
El, esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra de Pan, ya que sus clientes le demandan, y el debe comprarlo por mayor a las panaderias cercanas, para luedo reverder, dicha compra le ayudara a mejorar y a crecer su negocio.
Su sueño es mejorar el negocio, para con ello mejorar los ingresor y darle a sus hijos una educación adecuada.
texts.en:
Juan is married and lives with his wife and their 2 children. He is a distributor of bread. Juan began the business thanks to his own initiative and his wife's help. He has 8 years experience and  attends to his customers without a fixed schedule.

Juan is requesting a loan to buy bread to fulfill customer demand, and he needs to buy it at wholesale from nearby bakeries to later resell it. This purchase will help him to grow and better his business.

Juan's dream is to improve his business in order to increase his income and offer his children an adequate education.

loans.use: to buy bread to resell.

loans.name: Liz

texts.es: Liz, de 30 años, es una mujer muy trabajadora y luchadora, es soltera y vive en casa de sus padres a lado de ellos, asimismo ayuda constantemente en la economía de su hogar y es por eso que todos los días trabaja mucho para tener una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Liz consiste en la crianza de pollos, ella tiene un galpón que esta en la huerta de su casa, lleva ya trabajando con esto hace aproximadamente un año, y tiene la ayuda de su padre ya que él verifica a diario el crecimiento de sus pollos, y su madre quien sale a ofrecer y a vender en los diferentes mercadillos de la ciudad. Le gusta mucho este trabajo pues menciona que tiene ingresos diarios y le genera buenas ganancias, además es el único sustento de su familia, es rentable ya que su ganancia es un porcentaje alto. Espera poder seguir con este rumbo ya que le esta yendo bien, quisiera mas adelante instalar un  galpón más grande para así criar en mayor cantidad. Este será el sexto crédito con MFP, esta muy satisfecha con su grupo ya que son responsable y no tienen retrasos en sus pagos. Con el monto solicitado, comprará pollos pequeños para iniciar su crianza, además comprará vacunas, alimentos y algunos accesorios para criarlos.
texts.en: Liz is 30 years old and she is a very hardworking and she is a fighter. She is single and she lives in her parents' house together with them. She constantly contributes to the household economy and so she works very hard every day to have a better quality of life. Liz's business consists of raising poultry. She has a coop that is located in the garden of her house. She has been in business for approximately one year. Her father helps her by checking on the poultry every day. Her mother sets out to offer them up for sale in the different mini-markets in the city. She loves her work especially because she perceives a daily income and it generates good profits. It is the only source of support for the family and it is very profitable because the profit is a very high percentage. She hopes to keep working in this business because it has gone so well. She would like to install another larger cook in the future to be able to raise more poultry. This will be her sixth loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner). She is very satisfied with her group because they are responsible and they do not have any delays in their payments. With the amount requested, she will purchase chicks to raise them. She will also purchase vaccines, feeds, and a few accessories she needs to raise them.

loans.use: to purchase chicks, vaccines, and feed.

loans.name: Fetuamoamo

texts.en:
Fetuamoamo is 37 years of age and married with two children. Fetuamoamo owns & operates a business venture, planting & harvesting taro for sale.  She has many years of experience in this business. Fetuamoamo needs a loan of WST $2000 to purchase general farm supplies & equipment such as knives, spade, axe, sharpener and a wheel-barrow.  She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 300 talas or US $125 per week) to financially support immediate members of her family.

In 2005, Fetuamoamo joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.  Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral.  This is Fetuamoamo's 6th loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase general farm supplies & equipment such as knives, spade, axe, sharpener and a wheel-barrow

loans.name: Lourdes Mercedes

texts.es:
La Señora. Lourdes es socia del banco comunal Mujeres Floreciendo, vive por los alrededores de la parroquia de Paccha (Cuenca), este lugar es de clima frió, su gente se dedica a la cría de animales y a la agricultura, muchos salen diariamente a la ciudad de Cuenca a laborar en diferentes actividades, su gente mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus padres.

La Señora. Lourdes tiene 46 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 4 hijos de 27, 21, 19 y 10 años de edad, su primer hijo estudia en la universidad y trabaja, su segunda hija es casada e independiente, su tercer hijo estudia en la universidad y su ultimo hijo está estudiando en la escuela. Su esposo trabaja en un taller de latonería (arreglo de latas de los vehículos), la casa en la que viven es de su propiedad.
 
Doña Lourdes se dedica hace un año y medio en la limpieza y mantenimiento de casas y oficinas, trabaja de lunes a sábados todo el día. En su casa se dedica a la cría de animales como pollos y cerdos. 

En el banco comunal se encuentra en su segundo crédito al cual fue invitada por una amiga, el dinero de su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos y en  alimento para los mismos.

 Su meta es  criar más pollos y animales.
texts.en:
Lourdes is a member of the communal bank "Mujeres Floreciendo". She lives near the Parish of Paccha (Cuenca). This is a cold climate area and the people are dedicated to raising livestock and agriculture. Many set out daily to the city of Cuenca to work in their different business. The people maintain their culture and the traditions of their ancestors.

Lourdes is 46 years old and she is married. She has conceived 4 children from her marriage. They are 27, 21, 19, and 10 years old. Her eldest son is in university and he works. Her second daughter is married and she is independent. Her third son is in university and the youngest attends school. Her husband works in an auto body shop (repairing auto bodies). The house in which they live is their own property.

Lourdes has been cleaning and maintaining homes and offices for the past year and a half. she works from Monday to Saturday, all day. At home she raises livestock such as poultry and pigs.

She is on her second loan with her communal bank. She was initially invited by a friend. The funds from the new loan will be invested in the purchase of poultry and their feed.

Her goal is to raise more poultry and other livestock.

loans.use: to purchase poultry and their feed.

loans.name: Yakelin

texts.es:
Yakelin es socia del Banco Comunal “Bellavista” ubicado en el distrito de Puno, provincia y departamento de Puno, tiene 27 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene un  hijo  Ella cuenta con estudios de educación superior.
Se dedica a la venta de comidas al paso en el mercado central de Puno, su esposo la ayuda con la economía realizando servicio de taxi.  Desde hace tres años trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su préstamo anterior fue por la suma de S/. 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que utilizó para la compra de un carrito para la venta de comida al paso (salchipapas).
Con este nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,500.00 nuevo soles, comprará llantas e invertirá en el mantenimiento de su carro para que su esposo pueda continuar con el servicio de taxi y así permitir el ingreso de dinero diario.
La señora desea tener otro carro y tener un restaurante donde pueda vender más productos.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la facilidad del préstamo.
texts.en:
Yakelin is a member of the communal bank "Bellavista". It is located in the district of Puno, province and department of Puno. She is 27 years old and she is married common-law. She has one son. She has a post-secondary education.

She sells fast foods in the central market in Puno. Her husband contributes to their finances by providing taxi services. She has been working with the Manuela Ramos (Kiva Field Partner) movement for the past three years. Her previous loan was in the amount of S/.300 nuevos soles. The funds were used to purchase a fast-food card (salchipapas - a traditional dish consisting of french fries and sausages). 

With this new loan, amounting to S/. 1,500 nuevos soles, she will purchase tires and she will invest in the maintenance repairs of her husband’s car. This will enable him to continue providing taxi services and it will permit him to continue to earn a daily income.

She wants to have another car and she wants to have a restaurant from where to sell more products. What she enjoys about the communal bank is the easy loan process.

loans.use: to purchase tires and to invest in the maintenance repairs of her car.

loans.name: Litara

texts.en:
Litara is 31 years of age and married with two children. Litara owns & operates a business venture, planting & harvesting taro for sale.  She has many years of experience in this business. Litara needs a loan of WST $1000 to purchase general farm supplies & equipment such as knives, spade, axe, sharpener and a wheel-barrow.  She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 300 talas or US $125 per week) to financially support immediate members of her family.

In 2009, Litara joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.  Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral.  This is Litara's 3rd loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase general farm supplies & equipment such as knives, spade, axe, sharpener and a wheel-barrow

loans.name: Carmen Adriana

texts.es:
La Señorita. Carmen es socia del banco comunal Mujeres Floreciendo, vive por los alrededores de la parroquia del Valle (Cuenca), este lugar es de clima frió, su gente se dedica a la cría de animales y a la agricultura, muchos salen diariamente a la ciudad de Cuenca a laborar en diferentes actividades, su gente mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus padres.

La Señorita Carmen tiene 24 años de edad y es madre soltera de 2 hijos de 4 años y un bebé de 3 meses de edad. Vive con su madre compartiendo los gastos del hogar, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.
 
Ella se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar, a cuidar de sus hijos y a la venta de cosméticos de la marca Yanbal y Avon, esta actividad la desempeña hace un año y trabaja de domingo a domingo sin un horario fijo.
 
En el banco comunal se encuentra en su quinto crédito y lo va a invertir en la compra de más cosméticos y así ampliar su negocio.

Su meta es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Carmen is a member of the communal bank "Mujeres Floreciendo". She lives near the Parish of Del Valle (Cuenca). This is a cold climate area and the people are dedicated to raising livestock and agriculture. Many set out daily to the city of Cuenca to work in their different business. The people maintain their culture and the traditions of their ancestors.

Carmen is 24 years old and she is a single mother of 2 children, aged 4 and a 3-month old baby. She lives with her mother and she shares the household expenses. They do not have a house of their own, so they rent their space.

She does the household chores, takes care of her children, and she sells Yanbal and Avon brand cosmetics. It is a business she has had for the past year. She works from Sunday to Sunday although she does not have a fixed schedule.

Her goal is to have a house of her own.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics

loans.name: Luis Gilberto

texts.es:
Luis de 27 años, vive en una zona suburbana llamada “Durán”. Su negocio es de brindar servicios de moto taxi, la cual escogió esta actividad porque el empleo  anterior le dio una liquidación y con ese dinero se compro una moticleta.

Su horario es lunes a domingo, desde las 6:00am hasta las 20:00pm. Su dificultad es la competencia, ya que en su sector es bien transitado por motocicleta. No está casada y no tiene hijo.

El solicita el préstamo para repuesto de la moto, ya que está un poco deteriorada. Su sueño es comprar un terreno y construir su vivienda ya que vive con sus padres.
texts.en:
Luis is 27 years old and he lives in the suburban region named "Duran". His business is providing taxi services with his motorcycle transport. He chose this activity because his previous employment gave him a severance pay and with this money he purchased a motorcycle.

His schedule is from Monday to Sunday from 6:00 a.m. until 8:00 p.m. The difficulty which he faces is the competition. His sector is highly transited by motorcycles. He is not married and he does not have children.

He requests a loan to purchase a spare part for his motorcycle. It is somewhat deteriorated. His dream is to purchase a plot of land and to build a house. He currently lives with his parents.

loans.use: to carry out maintenance repairs to his motorcycle transport.

loans.name: Juana Magdalena

texts.es: La Señora Juana se dedica a la venta de cosméticos desde hace años, tiene un hijo pequeño, esta es su única fuente de ingresos y con esta actividad mantiene a su hijito y corre con todos los gastos del hogar, la clienta solicito el préstamo para de compra de cosméticos por mayor y de esta manera  para poder agrandar su negocio y tener mas ingresos, ya que es mucha la demanda que tiene y mas que todo por que ya se acercan las fiestas de fin de año y en  esta época es donde tiene mas ventas. La clienta agradece a la institución por la atención prestada y el buen trato que se le dio.
texts.en: Juana has been selling cosmetics for several years. She has a young son. This is her only source of income and this is how she is able to support her little boy. She is responsible for all of her household expenses. She requested a loan to purchase cosmetics in wholesale in order to expand her business and to increase her income. She sees a great level of demand and further more, the end of year holidays are approaching and this is when she has the most sales. She is thankful for the attention given and for the good level of care she received.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics in wholesale

loans.name: Jose Obdulio

texts.es:
Jose, vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos, es casado y dueño de una venta de cocos, dicho negocio surgio gracias a su  iniciativa y con la ayuda de su esposa desde hace 10 años, no tiene horario fijo para atender a sus clientes.
El esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra de mercadería (cocos secos y de agua) para mejorar su negocio esta compra le ayudara a atender su clientela satisfaciendo las necesidades de ellos y mejorando ingresos económicos a traves de las ventas.
El sueño de José es crecer en el negocio y mantenerse en el mercado para darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
José lives with his wife and two children. He is married and the owner of a coconut shop. José started this business through his own initiative and the help of his wife. They have been in business for 10 years and do not have a set schedule for attending to their customers.

José is requesting a loan to buy more inventory (dried coconuts and coconut water) so that he can improve his business and satisfy the needs of his customers. More sales will help improve his income.

José dreams of growing his business and maintaining his market share so that he can provide a better quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to buy coconut water and dried coconuts.

loans.name: Llerme

texts.es: Llerme, de 42 años, es una mujer dinámica y muy trabajadora, es conviviente con su pareja con quien no tiene ningún hijo y vive a lado de él en su casa propia, donde juntos trabajan para poder tener una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Llerme consiste en la venta de ropa, ella compra en cantidades, ya que así le sale más cómodo y puede venderlos a mejor precio. Su negocio lo realiza en su casa en donde van sus vecinos, amigos y familiares en busca de lo ultimo en moda y en calidad. Tiene cinco años realizando esta actividad y hasta el momento lo ha hecho sola, ya que su pareja se dedica a otras actividades. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que gana dinero y conoce personas que le son nuevos clientes, le esta yendo bien ya que vende todo el tiempo sus productos pues sus clientes saben que trae buenos productos y a un precio muy bajo. Espera poder consolidarse y poner una boutique para poder seguir trabajando. Este será el crédito número tres con MFP, le va bien con su grupo ya que todos son responsables, además manifiesta estar muy agradecida con ustedes por lo prestamos recibidos anteriormente que le ayudaron de mucho para su inversión. Con el monto solicitado, comprará más ropa e iniciará otro tipo de negocio, por el cual comprará juguetes y artículos femeninos.
texts.en: Llerme is 42 years old and she is a dynamic and very hardworking woman. She lives with her partner and they do not have children. She lives with him together in their own house. They work together to have a better quality of life. Llerme's work consists of selling clothing. She buys in large quantities because it is more affordable and she is able to sell at a better price. She carries out her business from her home and her neighbors, friends, and family come to look for the latest in fashion and quality. She has been in business for five years and to date she has done it alone. Her partner works in other businesses. What she likes about her work is that she is able to earn money and she knows people who are new clients. It has gone very well for her especially because she is able to sell her products at all times. Her clients know that she carries good quality products and at a very low price. She hopes to organize herself and set up a boutique to keep working. This is her third loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner) and it has gone well with her group because they are all responsible. She indicates that she is very thankful to all of you for the loans previously received. They helped her a great deal in her investment. With the amount she requests she will purchase more clothing and she will start up another type of business. She will purchase toys and ladies' merchandise.

loans.use: to purchase more clothing, toys, and ladies' merchandise.

loans.name: Yliane

texts.es:
Yliane de 44 años de edad, es soltera, vive en su casa propia con su madre y hermana, no cuenta con los servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Nueva Arica que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadería.

Yliane desde hace algunos años se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado caprino (cabras), su corral se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa, los cuales son apropiados y amplios, los alimenta con comida balanceada y pastos naturales para que sus animales lleguen a tener un crecimiento óptimo para ofrecerlos en los diferentes mercados de la zona y así obtenga muy buenas ganancias para solventar sus gastos diarios personales y de su casa.  

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar animales de otras especies y su alimento respectivo, con los ingresos que adquiera por la venta puede cubrir su crédito y mejorar su calidad de vida.  Yliane es una persona trabajadora y muy responsable que lo único que quiere es poderle brindar comodidades a su madre con su hermana y que tenga mejoras económicas.
texts.en:
Yliane is 44 years old and she is single. She lives in a house of her own together with her mother and sister. It is not equipped with the basic services. It is located in the rural region of the district of Nueva Arica, belonging to the province of Chiclayo. The region is known for its agricultural and farming activities.

Yliane has been raising and selling goats for a few years. Her corrals are located in the rear part of her property. They are appropriate and ample and she feeds her livestock balanced feed and natural grasses. She raises them until they reach an optimum growth and she sells them at the different markets in the region. She obtains very good profits and she is able to cover her daily expenses and the household expenses.

She requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) in the amount of 1500 nuevos soles to purchase other types of livestock and their feed. With the income that she will earn, she will be able to repay the loan and improve the quality of her life. Yliane is a hardworking person and very responsible. The only thing that she wants is to provide her mother and sister with certain comforts and to improve her finances.

loans.use: to purchase other types of livestock and their feed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy winter clothes to supply her business

loans.name: Makerita

texts.en:
Makerita is 40 years of age and married with eleven children. She owns and operates a business planting and harvesting  a variety of vegetables for sale. She has many years of experience in this business. Makerita needs a loan of WST $1,750 to purchase general farm supplies and equipment such as knives, spades, axes, sharpeners and a wheel-barrow. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 250 WST or US $104 per week) to financially support immediate members of her family.

In 2009, Makerita joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral. This is Makerita's 3rd loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase farm supplies and equipment

loans.name: Alejandra Irina

texts.es: La señora Alejandra tiene una tienda de artículos de bazar y ropa, en la avenida buenos aires la cual con dedicación poco a poco va creciendo en mercadería también en popularidad por que es la única, en la zona que vende este tipo de productos, la cliente cuenta que con mas esfuerzo piensa abrir otra tienda de similares características en otra ubicación mas comercial, y así seguir haciéndose de patrimonio para el bienestar de su familia y también personal, es una persona joven y emprendedora con muchas ganas de superación con deseos de crecer económicamente y de mejorar su calidad de vida, con el dinero del crédito tiene pensado comprar mercadería al por mayor en ropa de temporada y así de esta manera incrementar su capital.
texts.en:
Alejandra has a bazaar selling various items including clothing on Buenos Aires Avenue, which little by little is growing in popularity because it is the only one in the area that sells these types of products. She is thinking, that with a bit more struggle, of opening another store like this one at a different commercial location, and thereby to continue building up the well being of her family and for her staff.

She is an enterprising young woman who wants to succeed and wants her financial position and her quality of life to improve. The money from this loan is to buy seasonal clothing at wholesale prices in order to increase her assets.

loans.use: to buy seasonal clothing at wholesale prices

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es: Margarita, de 38 años, es una mujer sencilla y muy responsable, es muy valiente pues tiene la fuerza para poder seguir con su vida hacia delante aún siendo madre soltera. Ella tiene tres hijos de 19, 13 y 12 años, quienes dependen de ella para su educación y alimentación, vive en casa de sus padres junto a ellos y cuatro personas más, entre ellos sus hermanos y algunos sobrinos. El trabajo de Margarita consiste en la venta de comida, ella inicia sus labores muy temprano, sale en busca de sus productos frescos y saludable, de ahí se dirige a su casa para iniciar con la elaboración de sus platillos. A las 5 de la tarde empieza la venta, colocando la parrilla, para que de una vez se vayan asando los alimentos que preparó. Su puesto esta cerca de la municipalidad de Manantay, y lleva haciendo este trabajo por un año aproximadamente, asimismo recibe la ayuda de su hermana y juntas hacen que su trabajo sea muy entretenido. Todo le gusta de su trabajo ya que le encanta cocinar, estar en contacto con los clientes, pues ellos la consideran buena cocinera y además brinda un buen servicio. Espera mas adelante colocar mesas y sillas para ofrecer mayor comodidad a sus hijos. Este será el tercer crédito con la institución, le esta yendo bien y esta contenta de pertenecer a su grupo ya que hasta el momento todos se mostraron como personas responsables. Agradece también  a todos sus ustedes por su apoyo anteriormente, por lo que espera nuevamente su ayuda. Con el monto solicitado, comprará mesas, sillas, cubiertos, y algunas cosas más para implementar su puesto de comida.
texts.en:
Margarita is 38 years old. She is a sincere and responsible person, brave with the strength to improve her life, although being a single mother. She has three children who are 19, 13, and 12 years old who depend on her for their food and education. She lives with her parents in their house together with four more people including her siblings and some nieces and nephews. Margarita sells food. She begins work very early leaving in search of fresh and healthy food and from there she continues back to her house to begin the preparation of her food courses.

At five o’clock in the afternoon she begins her sales, putting out the grill, so they can roast the prepared food. She is located in the town of Montara Ray, and has been doing this work for about a year. Her sister helps her and together they enjoy their work very much. She likes everything about her work. She loves to cook. She likes serving her clients and they consider her a good cook, and she likes to give good customer service.

She wants to buy, at a later date, chairs and tables in order to provide more comfort for her children. This will be her third loan with this communal bank. Everything is going well and she is happy to belong to her group and everybody has shown themselves to be responsible members. She is also very grateful to all of you for your help in the past and she hopes you can help her again. She plans to buy tables, chairs and cutlery and some other things in order to prepare her food.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs

loans.name: Falanika

texts.en:
Falanika is 45 years of age and married with four children. She owns and operates a business providing general alterations of dresses and shirts to the local community and sewing different kinds of patterns for children, men and women. She has 3 years of experience in this business. Falanika needs a loan of WST $1,000 to purchase additional fabrics and materials. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 250 WST or US $104 per week) to improve/expand the business.

In 2010, Falanika joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral. This is Falanika's 2nd loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase additional fabrics and materials

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es:
